title: CDC Vaccine Schedules
description:
Quick access from CDC to ACIP-recommended immunization schedules, complete with footnotes. Intended for healthcare professionals recommending and administering vaccines to infants, children, adolescents, and adults. 
This app is one of an expanding collection of applications from CDC on a variety of specific topics, each optimized for your mobile device. When your device is connected, content is automatically updated so you have the most up-to-date information.
This tool provides:
•	Child and adolescent schedules, with immunization recommendations from birth through age 18
•	Adult schedule, listing recommended vaccines for adults by age group and by medical conditions 
•	Contraindications and precautions table, with footnotes applying to schedules
Features include
•	Color coding coordinates with printed schedules 
•	Hyperlinked vaccine name opens pop-up with dose specifics
•	Catch-up schedule for children 4 months through 18 years shows minimum dosing interval 
•	Related vaccine resources and websites
Automatic updates

comments: I love this app it is user friendly and there is a lot of useful information all in one place... simply awesome ... this comes in really handy instead of carrying around a huge book. it is well organized. handy tool for to help understand the various vaccinations for different ages and also catch up schedule for defaulters.... simply awesome..... this app is a must have for any healthcare provider...

This app is for healthcare professionals, not parents. That being said - it's a super handy reference and saves a ton of time! Note to parents: ask if your healthcare provider offers phone or email updates on your child's specific schedule.
Yes, it's info available online. However, this provides quicker access; therefore, I appreciate it.

title: Vaccine Reminder
description:
Your NEW Child Vaccine Manager!!!

1 – Add child – Enter Name, Date of Birth & County.
2 – Get the recommended vaccine schedule – Green, Red & Orange markers for the dose status
3 – Manage children vaccinations and maintain vaccine history for each shot!

If your country’s schedule is missing or requires an update, email us at feedback@pediatriconcall.com

Login will help save all your data on our cloud so that you can recover on any device. Also will help enable email notifications, child schedule sharing, ask doc & much more.

Also, there are separate sections to Vaccine Updates for Healthcare Professionals and Parents.
For Vaccine Reminder, registration is required on www.pediatriconcall.com to log in and use this app.

title: Vaccination Reminder
description:
Vaccination Reminder:
Vaccination of Child should be done well in time to protect the child from various diseases, but, today’s life style results in parents load with extensive responsibilities and stress. There might have been times when parent can forgot the date of getting your child vaccinated.
Vaccination Reminder is an android application which has been especially designed for parents to notify the important vaccination dates and keep a track of the vaccination schedules for their child. User will get notification one day before the scheduled vaccination date.
Features:
•	Does not require any Registration and Internet Connectivity to get Vaccination Schedule.
•	Vaccination Schedule is automatically generated by just entering Name and Date of Birth of the child
•	Receive Notifications One day before the scheduled vaccination date at 8:00 am so parent can arrange accordingly.
•	Vaccination Knowledge Center is included which  guide the parent about the Vaccination, No of doses and recommended Schedule as referred in  “IAP Guidebook on Immunization 2013-14” from 
•	There are some vaccination which parents does not want to give to their child due an number of reasons, so this app allows you to mark selective vaccination as “Not Interested”
•	Remarks field for each vaccination is given to enter any additional information such as doctor name, company of vaccination and place of vaccination etc.
•	Multiple Child can be added to track their vaccination schedule
•	Vaccination Schedule date can be modified as per the suggested by your pediatrician or health provider
•	Vaccination Schedule is derived as suggested by IAP (Indian Association of Pediatricians)
Legal Disclaimer:
The content on this android application is presented for information purpose only. The application does not intend to provide specific medical recommendation or professional advice. The application provides the information content on an ‘as is’ and ‘as available’ basis. User is advised to follow the instruction or vaccination schedule instructed by the professional child’s pediatrician or health care provider. User must consult with pediatrician or health provider before making any decision regarding your child immunization. Information regarding vaccinations, doses and schedule is taken from “IAP Guidebook on Immunization 2013-14”. User is advised to use this application as an aid to remember and track the vaccination schedule of the child.
In no event the developer of the application will be liable in any manner for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, indirect or punitive damages arising out of your access, use or inability to use the application or any errors/omission in the information on this application. The creator of the application reserves the right at any time and from time to time to add, modify and update or discontinue, temporarily or permanently the application (or any part thereof) with or without notice. The creator of the application shall not be liable to you or to any third party for any addition, modification, suspension or discontinuation of this application.

title: Vaccines Guide
description:
This app is designed for health professionals and students, however anyone interested in knowing the various types of vaccines, their schedules, indications and contraindications will find this app very helpful. 
It follows a simple and straight forward academic design and streamlined approach to make it equally easy to use both for those who are looking for a specific piece of information and  those who use this app as a primary guide to know about vaccines and  immunization.

SALIENT FEATURES:
1):  This app contains detail information regarding the types, usage, and contraindications of almost all commonly used vaccines in clinical settings (approx 25 vaccine preventable infections).
2):  Routine childhood immunization schedules currently in practice in various parts of the world like US, UK, Australia, India and Pakistan. (Pro Version Only)
3): . Vaccination recommendations for specific population groups like Healthcare workers, Pregnant women and Asplenic individuals. (Pro Version Only)
4): All info collected from credible and recognized authoritative sources.

To ensure accuracy has been the primary concern throughout the development of this app, however feel free to point out any errors or omissions in the content of this app. Comments and feedback regarding content quality and for further improvement of this are highly welcomed.

DISCLAIMER:

This app is intended for educational use only and should be used as such. It must not be considered equivalent to a medical advice on which serious decisions may be based. Contact your local healthcare authorities in case of any health concerns. The user assumes all the responsibility for the use of information provided in this app.

title: Vaccine reminder & Booking- Kidkare
description:
Immunization is key to child survival. Missing Routine Immunization (RI) can be life-threatening for infants. Immunization is one of the most effective and cost-effective ways to protect children’s lives and futures. More than half of the world’s most vulnerable children still miss out on the essential vaccines they need to survive and live healthy lives. Globally, 1.5 million deaths could be avoided if children were vaccinated. In the future, we will also be adding an adult vaccine booking feature in which a nurse will come and administer the vaccine at your home.
Kidkare is an android application that has been specially designed for parents to notify the vaccination dates and keep track of the vaccination schedules for their child. User will get notification two days before the scheduled vaccination date they will also get vaccines information
Features of the app
1)The users should register and have internet connectivity to get a full vaccine schedule.
2) If any vaccine is missed by the parents the app will automatically change the date of upcoming vaccine/vaccines according to rules suggested by the Indian Association of Pediatrician (IAP).
3)Vaccination Schedule is automatically generated by just entering the Name and Date of Birth of the child.
4) The app has all the information on vaccines like doses, general information, and part of the body where the vaccine should be administered.
5) Multiple children can be added to track their vaccination schedule.
6) The vaccination schedule can be modified according to your healthcare providers.

legal disclaimer
The content on this android application is presented for information purpose only the application is not providing any type of medical recommendations to parents.

The creator of the application reserves the right at any time and from time to time to add, modify and update or discontinue, temporarily or permanently the application with or without prior notice.
The creator of the application is not liable to you and any third-party for any addition, modification, or suspension of the app.

title: BabyBoo : Growth, Development, Vaccination Tracker
description:
BabyBoo, built leveraging blockchain technology will be used to digitize vaccine cards. BabyBoo will be One Stop Solution for a parent, as it has everything related to baby health and development. The digital vaccine card will record the vaccination date, dosage, batch details, vaccine schedules, other data during the time of each vaccination. BabyBoo also provides information on each vaccine type to spread awareness about vaccines and clear any doubts that parents might have about the vaccine. Parents can set vaccine reminder for their child’s vaccinations and find a nearby health center, chat to doctors and schedule appointments through the app. Immunization is a very important task for the child’s health. Vaccinations now can be an easy task for new parents. BabyBoo app will also feature an integrated blockchain wallet where vaccine tokens are added after each vaccination. Each wallet has a globally unique wallet address that helps us to secure and decentralize the application.

BabyBoo will also provide growth and development tracker of a child so that parents can use it as a checklist to track their child’s growth and have their own growth chart. Also, every mother can have complete information about early nutrition of her baby. BabyBoo App will also support multiple languages and language agnostic designs in the near future to help improve adaptability. 

With BabyBoo, the parents can keep their young ones busy with our latest Entertainment Section which will help the kids engaged in fun activities. BabyBoo’s platform offers to keep your worries at bay by providing you and your child with a safe and secure entertainment/leisure environment. 

Young minds will tend to learn and develop things faster with the optimum use of technology, with our additional features of entertainment  with Rhymes, Stories, Cartoons, Learning videos & Lullabies.

It is user friendly and passionately crafted for parents which will help in coexisting with their professional and personal life with the assurance of content provided in the application and an advisable time limit. 



Additional features that we provide
============================
Digital Vaccine report- Easiest way to keep the vaccine cards secure. 
Developmental milestones- Know each and every step of your baby and their growth. This works as a child growth tracker and and growth checklist. 
Food milestones- Information about what and which type of food can be given to your baby at different ages. 
BabyBoo Store- Use this app and get a chance to get free gifts and buy goodies from our BabyBoo store
Reminders for Next Vaccines- BabyBoo app gives you periodic reminders about the next due vaccines. 
Easy communication with doctor- Have any doubts about your child’s health? Get in touch with the doctor through this app and get an answer to all your questions.
Save all your baby’s pictures, videos at one place- Did your baby crawl? Or did he/she take his/her first step? Click a picture, save it in your feed and share it with your family and friends.

title: Growth Chart, Development Milestones & Vaccination
description:
Parenting app & Baby Tracker app: Simplified sections for Growth chart, developmental milestones, food tracker, Vaccination and Health tip.

Baby tracker parenting app for parents of 0 to 5 year child.

Key Features of this parenting app: 

1. Growth Tracker: Can plot growth chart which will ensure about child growth. Parents can enter birth details for weight, height, head circumference and then you can add growth details every month. Growth Book app will automatically plot Growth chart for your child. Parents can also share this with your family and friends. World Health Organization (WHO) Z score and Fenton Preterm Chart are used for making this Growth Chart. All the charts are available in Kg, Lbs. and cm, inch. 

2. Food tracker: In this segment, parents can check nutrition details of all food ingredients and recipes. Age specific baby diet chart are given with all diet related advice. Parents can actually enter all the ingredients and can add a baby recipe, and app will calculate the nutritional details of your recipe. Parents can also count calories taken by their child and compare with recommended calories required by child.

3. Development Tracker: Parents will be able to check child’s development milestones according to age like 2 months, 4 months, 6 months, 9 months, 18 months and 1 to 5 years.  Each development milestone is shown with reference photo or a video of kid with the reference age. You can also answer the development milestone according to your child, this will help you to identify any kind of developmental delay and can act early for your child.

4. Vaccination Tracker: This section of this baby tracker app, covers everything about vaccination. According to child's age automatically all the due vaccines will be seen. You can also click on information and you will get all the information and frequently asked questions about vaccination. List of all vaccines (including past and future will be shown). All vaccination details and information are given in Hindi as well as English. We have added 120+ country vaccination schedule in the app, you can select as per your country location.

5. Heath tips: Every day a new age specific health tip will come in this section. All health tips are designed and reviewed by a doctor, which ensures that each and every information is precise and correct. descriptionHTML:
Parenting app & Baby Tracker app: Simplified sections for Growth chart, developmental milestones, food tracker, Vaccination and Health tip.

Baby tracker parenting app for parents of 0 to 5 year child.

Key Features of this parenting app:

1. Growth Tracker: Can plot growth chart which will ensure about child growth. Parents can enter birth details for weight, height, head circumference and then you can add growth details every month. Growth Book app will automatically plot Growth chart for your child. Parents can also share this with your family and friends. World Health Organization (WHO) Z score and Fenton Preterm Chart are used for making this Growth Chart. All the charts are available in Kg, Lbs. and cm, inch.

2. Food tracker: In this segment, parents can check nutrition details of all food ingredients and recipes. Age specific baby diet chart are given with all diet related advice. Parents can actually enter all the ingredients and can add a baby recipe, and app will calculate the nutritional details of your recipe. Parents can also count calories taken by their child and compare with recommended calories required by child.

3. Development Tracker: Parents will be able to check child’s development milestones according to age like 2 months, 4 months, 6 months, 9 months, 18 months and 1 to 5 years. Each development milestone is shown with reference photo or a video of kid with the reference age. You can also answer the development milestone according to your child, this will help you to identify any kind of developmental delay and can act early for your child.

4. Vaccination Tracker: This section of this baby tracker app, covers everything about vaccination. According to child's age automatically all the due vaccines will be seen. You can also click on information and you will get all the information and frequently asked questions about vaccination. List of all vaccines (including past and future will be shown). All vaccination details and information are given in Hindi as well as English. We have added 120+ country vaccination schedule in the app, you can select as per your country location.

title: Vaccinations App – E-Passport
description:
The Weatherbys Vaccination App interrogates data pre-raceday on one centralised digital platform, with direct data connectivity to the Passport Issuing Organisation (Weatherbys), the BHA, Horse Racing Ireland and the Irish Horseracing Regulatory Board. 
An electronic archive system captures and indexes all historical vaccination data. This cost neutral industry system can provide the regulatory body with a geographical overview of the vaccination status of all horses, not only horses in training but also breeding stock, horses at sales and horses out of training, thereby creating greater biosecurity standards across Britain and Ireland.
Ensuring that Thoroughbreds are not exposed to unvaccinated horses on the racecourse is a key part of protecting equine welfare. Maintaining accurate, up-to-date electronic records of vaccination dates of horses in training could allow entries to race being conditional on horses being correctly vaccinated. Less time spent by Veterinary Officers (VO’s) manually checking vaccinations on raceday will allow time to carry out other veterinary duties related to equine welfare (eg. pre-race checks). The application will also be able to assist with identifying risk of spread in the event of another Equine Influenza outbreak, and aid informed communications with participants.

title: Vaccine Schedule
description:
Vaccine Schedule App is a compact guide on latest immunization recommendations, for health care workers. Please note that since the recommendations on I keep changing, we put our best efforts to keep the app updated. But still there might be something outdated, therefore it is advisable to confirm the guidelines before using them in practicing.

Main features of the app are:

* National Immunization Programme of India.

* Immunization Time Table of Indian Academy of Pediatrics (IAP).

* Recommendations of IAP on use of each vaccine.

* 2017 recommendations on Immunization of children and adolescents in United States (source: CDC)

* It provides detailed description about the dosage, usage and catch up vaccination for each of the vaccines.

* Additionally there is information about certain vaccines which are not included in the vaccination schedule and vaccines which are to be given only to certain high risk individuals.

* There also is a section on frequently asked questions for families. It will be updated time to time whenever there is any change in the vaccination schedule.

Expect WHO recommendations on Immunization in future updates.

Please provide your valuable feedback.

This App requires Internet permission.

title: VDD Baby - Vaccination Reminder ,Daily Needs,Diary
description:
3 in 1 App for Baby Vaccination schedule, Daily needs monitoring and maintaining baby's milestones in diary.

1.	Vaccination Reminder
Our Baby is very precious to us and to make them stronger health wise, maintaining immunization schedule is very crucial. But often parents forget important dates of vaccination due to their busy schedule. This Vaccination tracker app creates vaccination chart for your baby automatically based on Baby’s date of birth. Also it sends out reminders before or on due date of vaccination.
This App currently covers Baby vaccination schedules India only.
     The immunization tracker reminder module has been specifically made to help out parents to keep up with the latest vaccines and also customized reminders can help parents in taking prior appointments with doctors to be up-to-date with vaccination. Parents can also view upcoming vaccines schedule and also change the vaccination due date and set Remind Before Days.
The Vaccination reminder will be push notifications which users can see in their notification area. So with this App’s help by following simple steps, you will be on time with the baby immunization.
•	Create a profile of your baby.
•	 You will see a predefined Vaccination Chart for your Child according to DOB.
•	Know the vaccination sort with next planned date.
•	You will Receive a notifications before the due date.
•	You can also mark them as done.

2.	Daily Needs
With “Daily needs”, you can keep track of almost everything your baby needs. You can set reminders for baby things so that your inventory will be up to date.
For “Baby Needs”, you can create customized reminders with which you will be reminded specific days before. You can set ‘Remind before days’ properly so that you can order beforehand if you usually order online.
You can also add new “Baby Needs” to the list. With this module, you can create “Baby Checklist” and get push notifications of reminder in the notification area.

3.	Baby Diary
With "Baby diary", you can keep all memories of your baby forever by adding photos and captions to baby timeline. Also you can mention dates in “Baby Diary”. You can also have a single scroll-able card view of all the pages or diary items added which are sorted by the date of activity.
Also with “Baby Diary”, you can create a beautiful story video from the diary items with the single click. The story video created can be shared with loved ones and can be shown on your baby’s first birthday. With “Baby diary”, you will never miss the different milestones achieved by your baby such as Started Crawling, Started rolling over, first birthday.

title: Pneumococcal Vaccines
description: The availability of two different vaccine products and frequent changes to the ACIP’s (Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices) recommendations for pneumococcal vaccination make the process of selecting the recommended pneumococcal vaccine (sometimes referred to as "pneumonia vaccine") sequence and interval for each patient complex and time-consuming. The Pneumococcal Vaccines App by Multifaceted Approach, LLC provides a quick and easy method that provides the most appropriate, evidence-based answer for any possible adult patient scenario. All you must do is provide answers to four simple questions and your recommendations are ready to go.  Even for someone that knows these algorithms like the back of their hand, the convenience of an accurate double-check and no longer using a calendar to manually calculate the dates of the minimum acceptable interval makes The Pneumococcal Vaccines App definitely worth downloading.

title: Dog Vaccinations
description:
Lucky for us, there are vaccines to help prevent many illnesses that affect dogs. Vaccinating your dog has long been considered one of the easiest ways to help him live a long, healthy life. Not only are there different vaccines for different diseases, there are different types and combinations of vaccines.
Although vaccination has the potential to protect pets against life-threatening diseases, vaccination is not without its risks. Recently, there has been some controversy regarding the duration of protection and timing of vaccination, as well as the safety and necessity of certain vaccines. 
What does this all mean for your dog? Vaccination is a procedure that has risks and benefits that must be weighed for every dog relative to his lifestyle and health. Your veterinarian can determine a vaccination regime that will provide the safest and best protection for your individual dog.
We always visit the veterinarian in animal hospital or vet hospital for Dog Vaccinations or cat neutering, in an animal care center (animal clinic ), to make vaccines to our dogs, but we can do Dog Vaccinations at home too.

Dog Vaccinations App Features:

•	What Exactly Are Vaccines?
•	All about pet vaccinations. 
•	Dog Vaccine Recommendations.
•	Vaccinate Your Dog at Home.

INSTALL Dog Vaccinations App for FREE and learn all you need about Dog Vaccinations.

title: Shots Immunizations
description:
Shots by American Academy of Family Physicians and Society of Teachers of Family Medicine is perfect for physicians, teachers, and other health care providers or for anyone who needs quick answers to tough vaccine questions. In addition to the complete set of CDC vaccine schedules and footnotes, the app includes important up-to-date information about each vaccine, including: basics and dosing schedule, high-risk indications, adverse reactions, contraindications, catch-up, administration, epidemiology, brand names and coding information, and excipients/additives. All Shots content is written by immunization experts from STFM and AAFP and includes commentary on each vaccine.
 
What vaccines would you recommend for a 10-month-old who has had only one dose of each of the basic vaccines and at what times would you have him return in order to catch up? How about his cousin who babysits? She’s a 19-year-old college freshman with asthma who thinks she might be pregnant. Or their grandfather, a 62-year-old with diabetes and renal failure? Input a patient’s age, conditions, and special circumstances, and the Shots app will tell you which vaccines are indicated.
 
What’s New:
• Updated with 2018 CDC recommended schedules and footnotes
• Now co-developed by American Academy of Family Physicians and Society of Teachers of Family Medicine
• By Profile: Enter patient’s age, conditions, and special circumstances and see a list of recommended immunizations

title: Child Electronic Registration and Vaccination
description: Child electronic registration and vaccination app facilitates EPI program of Health department Pakistan to manage status of fully immunized children in Pakistan. This app is fully integrated with Web based EPI MIS and database of child registration from this app get synchronized with database of routine EPI MIS through Restfull services. Vaccinators of fixed centers and outreach use this application to maintain their permanent registers electronically. This application allows then to find pending vaccination and defaulter children from the app database. Moreover, this app facilitate vaccinators to search existing child easily for next vaccination

title: BabyVaccine
description:
Hi everybody........... It is our third app.This is intended to be used by general public (earlier apps were for doctors and health workers).Just click on  DATE OF BIRTH button select Date of birth of  your baby;click on VACCINE DATE button.The vaccine dates of your child up to 15 years of age shall be shown.
In this version only mandatory vaccines which are given to most of the babies in kerala are shown.
please see that the date setting in your smart phone is correct.
ver 1.2
one bug at calculation fixed.All users installed prior to 21/09/2015: please update the app
Ver 1.2.3
Recent change in vaccine schedule in kerala govt  health service by adding IPV(injectable polio vaccine).Which is an inactivated trivalent polio vaccine.is given on 6th and 14th weeks vaccine date along with pentavacc  and bivalent oral polio vaccine is shown in this version.
version 11 
RVV (Rotavirus vaccine) added .MMR at 15 th month dropped. and given along with DPT at 18 months. DPT at 5th year.Td vaccine at 10 and 15.Table arrangement corrected

title: Dog vaccinations
description:
"accines help prevent many illnesses that affect pets. Vaccinating your pet has long been considered one of the easiest ways to help him live a long, healthy life. Not only are there different vaccines for different diseases, there are different types and combinations of vaccines. Vaccination is a procedure that has risks and benefits that must be weighed for every pet relative to his lifestyle and health. Your veterinarian can determine a vaccination regime that will provide the safest and best protection for your individual animal.

Understanding Vaccines
Vaccines help prepare the body's immune system to fight the invasion of disease-causing organisms. Vaccines contain antigens, which look like the disease-causing organism to the immune system but don't actually cause disease. When the vaccine is introduced to the body, the immune system is mildly stimulated. If a pet is ever exposed to the real disease, his immune system is now prepared to recognize and fight it off entirely or reduce the severity of the illness."

title: Vaxini vaccines vaccination
description:
Vaccine tracker and vaccination reminder based on the vaccine schedule recommended for your country. A vaccination reminder will prompt you when vaccines are upcoming. Vaxini is the vaccination app for a lifetime. Track vaccines for multiple babies, toddlers, children, teens, adults, pregnancy. Have your vaccine records at hand.

Proactively promote health: protect your family and yourself using Vaxini Professional Vaccine App. Track your vaccine history and record your paper vaccination book.

Vaxini will remind you to make an appointment with the doctor for the next vaccination. Immunization profile and vaccine schedule, vaccine recommendations, vaccination reminders, vaccine types, over 3000 vaccine products in our knowledge database. For adults tracking regular boosters or travel vaccination. Share your vaccine user profile with your relatives and healthcare professionals. 

All countries worldwide are included. Vaxini is the vaccine network acting as the immunization registry for over 200 countries, including all vaccine brands and vaccination products in the world, both current and historically available since 1943. Vaxini regularly updates the local country schedules and vaccination products based on the information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and local health authorities like CDC and healthcare associations. 

Automatic vaccine updates, reminders, country detection. Create your safe, lifetime account for free and you are ready to go. Secured by strong encryption, compliant with the strictest European data privacy laws. Never lose your vaccine records again. A central repository for families, with info about antigens, antibodies, serums, antitoxins, serogroups. Instant backup of information in the cloud. If you lose or change your phone, install Vaxini in your new device and get your vaccination data, family vaccination profile and immunization records back immediately. 

Secure your vaccine records forever. Store the vaccine brand, batch number, health care provider that administered the vaccine, vaccination site, write comments, problems, adverse reactions, health condition, antibody titer, symptoms, diseases. Snapshot vaccine stamps, physician’s signature and seal, vaccination bar code and immunization labels in Vaxini. You can also add relevant comments and conditions, healthcare data, vaccination funding and vaccine payments, therapy, resistance to disease and infections, reactions, etc.

Record vaccines straight away and get timely reminders for future shots in advance for the vaccination date based on the recommended immunization program. You can enter past vaccines from your vaccination records, when you have your vaccine record card at hand. Vaxini will let you know what your kids are in for before their vaccination appointment with the doctor. Add your favorite vaccination center through the map widget.

Vaxini includes all vaccine types, vaccine brands and immunization schedules in the world, tracking about 100 different infectious diseases. Add custom vaccines and hide suggestions for non-applied vaccination rounds. Also add special vaccines that are not listed in the standard immunization schedule for your country. Vaxini transparently adapts to the vaccination schedule suggested by your physician.

Vaxini also includes investigational products undergoing clinical trials for vaccine preventable diseases.

title: Immunize India
description:
Nearly 2 million children under the age of 5 years die every year in India and an estimated equal number are disabled for life. Indian Academy of Pediatrics (IAP) estimates that over 50% of these are vaccine preventable. 

Owing to the high dropout rates among Indian parents, ImmunizeIndia Charity launched ImmunizeIndia in March 2014, a national non-profit initiative, under the aegis of the IAP. The vaccination reminders are based on the vaccination calendar of IAP which includes the mandatory vaccinations as per the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India. However, the Service also provides reminders for additional vaccinations recommended by IAP.

ImmunizeIndia is the world’s largest vaccination reminder service
ImmunizeIndia is a free of cost vaccination reminder service from IAP. The service is available to parents anywhere in India. ImmunizeIndia  has over 1.5 million children enrolled on its SMS service  and saves thousands of children from death or disability already. The service aims to prevent half a million child deaths and disabilities by 2020 by registering 20 million children on the service. 

In order to reach this target a simple, easy to use ImmunizeIndia app has been developed. This ImmunizeIndia app will provide customised reminders to caregivers to ensure that their children are vaccinated on time and complete the mandatory set of immunisations as per the Government of India and IAP.

ImmunizeIndia has designed a simple easy to use app for providing customised vaccination reminders to caregivers (parent). The desired impact of this app is to ensure that children  receive all their mandatory vaccinations on time. 

The immunizeindia app provides three reminder alerts for the caregiver in the week that the vaccinations are due. The app requires data on both the child and parent or caregiver. It is the responsibility of the registering caregiver to provide the correct information at the time of signing up. The app uses the information provided to schedule the reminder alerts till the child is 12 years old.

title: Immunization Planner
description:
Immunization Planner : Never forget a vaccination date anymore

Immunization Planner is a FREE immunization reminder APP that helps in tracking vaccination in an easy way along with tracking development milestones of your baby.

Main features:

-You can track vaccination schedule of more than one child.

- Immunization schedule of child is displayed in an easy way.

- Location of Child in their immunization journey is displayed to easily identify future pending vaccinations.

- Mark vaccinations which has already been done.

- Add reminders for the future vaccinations and update them anytime later.


Learn about Vaccination / Immunization :

- Myths and Facts section that help people overcome their apprehensions regarding vaccination.

- Provides summary about several diseases to which immunization is mainly targeted.


Developmental milestones are things most children can do by a certain age.

- Track the Developmental milestones of your baby.


Disclaimer:

This App is only intended to be general summary information to the user. 
This application is not intended to provide medical advice. Any questions regarding a user’s personal medical condition should be directed to the application user’s primary care physician.

*Images courtesy of  CDC Public Health Image Library

title: myViavac
description:
myViavac, the swiss electronic vaccination record for smartphone. 

With myViavac, which is available in 4 languages (French, German, Italian and English) you can: 

- create and manage your own electronic vaccination record so as not to lose it… 
- know which vaccines are useful to you or not, depending on your personal situation (illness, profession, family and social contacts, travel) or your personal choice... 
- see immediately whether you are well protected or whether you are missing certain vaccines... 
- choose the doctors or pharmacists who you will authorise to validate or complete your vaccination record... 
- enrol to receive notification (text message, email) whenever a vaccination is due... 

If you already have a vaccination record, an electronic assistant will help you to register your vaccinations: enter some of the letters from the name of the vaccine, choose from a list of corresponding vaccines and indicate the date of each vaccination. If you haven’t a vaccination record, an electronic assistant will ask you some simple questions (for example: were you vaccinated during your childhood?) to help you reconstitute your vaccination history. 

As soon as you have finished, the list of vaccines received for each illness will appear. With one simple click, you get a free vaccinal assessment! For each illness, a green light or a red light will indicate whether you are up to date or not. 

You can keep your vaccination record - or better still, authorise your doctor or pharmacist to access it: this allows them to see which vaccines you have recorded, to complete them if necessary and to validate them, so that this official vaccination record can then be printed out as often as you wish! 

Would you like to be informed when a vaccination is due? A notification can be sent to you, free of charge, by text message or email, as soon as a vaccination is necessary. 

For more information : www.myvaccines.ch !

title: Rabies Shot Scheduler
description:
Rabies Shot Scheduler is an easy-to-use application where anyone can generate a complete schedule of Anti-rabies vaccine shots as per World Health Organization (WHO) guidelines.

This app can be useful for health care professionals like doctors, nurses, medical students and other paramedics who need to treat and vaccinate their patients who come to the ER/Hospital with a history of dog bites or other animal bites. They can use this application to generate a vaccination schedule for their patients and also, calculate the doses of Rabies Immunoglobulin (RIG) whenever it's necessary. This application will save a lot of time.

• How to use this application?

Step 1: Pick the date of your first anti-rabies vaccine shot from the given calendar field.

Step 2: Select the type of exposure.

- Select 'Post-exposure Prophylaxis' if you got bitten by a suspected rabid animal and never took anti-rabies vaccine before.

- Select 'Pre-exposure Prophylaxis' if you are not bitten by any stray dogs or wild animals but want to get immunized against this fatal disease. Laboratory technicians, veterinary doctors, animal handlers, wildlife workers, etc. should receive this prophylaxis.

Step 3: Touch the 'Generate Schedule' button. 

- You will get a list of five vaccination dates (Day 0, 3, 7, 14 and 28) if you select the first option, i.e. Post-exposure Prophylaxis.
- You will get a list of three vaccination dates  (Day 0, 7, 21 or 28) if you select the second option, i.e. Pre-exposure Prophylaxis.

• Rabies Immunoglobulin (RIG):
 Rabies Immunoglobulin is necessary along with the modern cell culture Anti-rabies Vaccines in case of Category - III (severe) bite wounds. This antiserum should be infiltrated locally in and around the wound within 0 - 7 days after the bite.

• How to calculate the dosage of Rabies Immunoglobulins? 

Step 1: Navigate to 'RIG Dose Calculator' option from the left sliding panel and then enter your body weight in the text box.

Step 2: Select the type of antiserum - Human Rabies Immunoglobulin (HRIG) or Equine Rabies Immunoglobulin (ERIG).

Step 3: Touch on the 'Calculate Dose' button.

The app will calculate and show the dosage of your selected antiserum instantly.

You can also browse different pages of the app from the sliding menu (left) to learn about rabies in humans, its causes, signs and symptoms, vaccination prophylaxis, rabies immunoglobulin, wound management and treatment options etc.

This app extracts data directly from our web server. So, you need to connect your Android devices (smartphones and tablets) to the Internet while using this app.

title: VaccineApp
description:
Uma das grandes dificuldades da população é o calendário de imunizações. São muitas as dúvidas: quais as vacinas que devem ser administradas e em qual faixa etária? Para que servem? Além disso, o nosso calendário oficial de vacinação, oferecido pelo Ministério da Saúde (SUS), oferece cobertura vacinal completa? Teria alguma outra vacina recomendada pelo sistema privado de saúde? Desta forma, o assunto vacinação e imunização torna-se de fundamental importância dentro do cenário de saúde atual. Ademais, há sempre dúvidas sobre o assunto,  meu calendário está atualizado? Quais as próximas doses? E quais já deveria ter sido administradas?

Pensando neste cenário, desenvolvemos o VaccineApp, aplicativo que fornece informações básicas sobre o calendário nacional de vacinação, o PNI e também de vacinas que não são disponibilizadas pelo SUS mas são recomendadas por redes privadas de saúde como por exemplo a Sociedade Brasileira de Pediatria (SBP).

Seu objetivo é mostrar, através da data de nascimento, quais serão as próximas vacinas a serem administradas e quais já deveriam ter sido aplicadas até aquela data, de forma a facilitar a conferencia do cartão vacinal, com o diferencial de informar quais as vacinas não são contempladas pelo Programa Nacional de Imunizações. Além disso, informações básicas sobre as vacinas são oferecidas, como as doenças cobertas, quantas doses são necessárias, principais indicações e contra-indicações e principal efeito adverso.

title: HIPRAlink® Vaccination
description:
HIPRAlink® Vaccination 2.0 is the new app developed by Laboratorios Hipra S.A that provides traceability services in vaccination processes in Animal Health.

HIPRAlink® Vaccination is synchronized with HIPRA vaccination devices, which record all the information of the process, as well as the detail of the vials used in vaccination.

The functionalities that the app presents are:
* Helps planning future vaccination sessions: By creating Reminders and Vaccination Plans.
* Allows control of all vaccination data that has been automatically synchronized (not entered manually).
* It facilitates the analysis through evolution graphs, vaccination speed and different filters.
* Possibility of downloading Traceability Reports that certify the correct vaccination.

With this new version of HIPRAlink® Vaccination, HIPRA improves the performance of the app and usability for the user to position itself as a benchmark in total traceability in the vaccination processes in Animal Health.

title: Free - Vaccine Reactions
description: Quick access from the CDC and the FDA to: All vaccines and manufactures of each vaccine approved by the FDA including full vaccine inserts--with all adverse reactions and ingredients highlighted, VAERS (Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System) guidelines and Vaccine Court pursuing information.
descriptionHTML: Quick access from the CDC and the FDA to: All vaccines and manufactures of each vaccine approved by the FDA including full vaccine inserts--with all adverse reactions and ingredients highlighted, VAERS (Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System) guidelines and Vaccine Court pursuing information.
summary: Access from CDC and FDA to: Vaccines inserts, VAERS and Vaccine Court info.
recentChanges: fixed some bugs
comments: Incomplete information, for example the list of adverse side effects. Watch dr. Suzanne Humphries videos you will get a way better picture than this app. A little example: There have been above 500 deaths of the Gardasil vaccine in addition to many cases of paralysis, still death and paralysis is NOT listed as a adverse reaction. This is brainwashing people!

I wish there was a 0 stars. This is a pile of misinformation and highlights out of context. If you want to be mislead, this is the app for you. If you actually want to learn, read the inserts and the why of the components. Visit a graveyard from before the vaccine for diptheria. Witness the countless tombstones for children. Learn all you can from people who understand that the dose makes the poison. Or, have a measles party and end up in the ICU. Google it.

The author does not know the difference between adverse reactions and adverse events, and conflating the two is a sure sign that the author is an amateur in this arena, along with the fact that he includes the Vitamin K shot in the list of vaccines. Guess anything that comes from a needle is a "vaccine." Author also fails to note the rate of adverse events in the vaccinated group versus the placebo group - in many cases, they are virtually the same. The app seems to have been created in order to sell their MLM-based "TRS Detox" spray, as the "vaccine help" link contains that information and nothing else. There is no need for the author to respond with the copy/paste paragraph about vaccine court compensation. Everyone acknowledges that the vaccine court has paid out approximately 4 billion dollars to approximately 6,000 claimants since 1986. In the same time period, several hundred million vaccines have been administered, so the court payout data supports the statistics stating that true vaccine reactions are less than 1 in 1,000,000.

It's nice to have a tool for easy accessibility to factual information on the subject of vaccines without the information being filtered or screened or removed. I will be sharing wity everyone I know to ensure they have access to informed consent. Thank you for creating this app.

Very informative & unbiased. Makes it easy to research the vaccine ingredients & reactions all in one place, straight from the manufactures' package inserts. There are ads. I'm going to pay the 1.99 for the ad free version!

title: Vaccines on the Go
description:
Get vaccine information—Anytime. Anywhere. Find videos, animations & graphics. Ask us questions. Info includes safety, diseases, immune system & more.

It is easier than ever to get health information. But sometimes,  it’s difficult to weed out the “good” information (which is scientifically accurate) from the “bad” information (which is not based on science). This is especially true for vaccines.

In a continued effort to provide the public with information about the science, safety and importance of vaccines, the Vaccine Education Center at Children's Hospital of Philadelphia (VEC) created Vaccines on the Go: What You Should Know so busy parents can access the information wherever and whenever they need it. 

Vaccines on the Go: What You Should Know contains information about:
     • Vaccines and the diseases they prevent
     • Recommended immunization schedules for children, teens and adults
     • Vaccine safety concerns, including autism, thimerosal and too many vaccines 
     • How the immune system works, including what happens during an infection or when a           person is immune compromised
     • Disease and vaccine information related to travel, including descriptions of cholera, Japanese encephalitis virus, typhoid and yellow fever

Additional features include:     
     • Graphics depicting disease characteristics, such as levels of contagiousness and typical disease timelines
     • Links to videos about vaccines, including animations related to how viruses attack cells, maternal antibodies and immunizations, and more
     • Vaccine-related trivia   
     • A place to record notes or questions for the next doctor’s visit
     • Ways to stay connected with the VEC, including sending us vaccine-related questions or signing up for Parents PACK, our free monthly e-newsletter  
     • Links to other online VEC resources, like booklets and Q&A sheets

This version of the Vaccines on the Go: What You Should Know mobile application is optimized for Android Devices running Android 4.1.x or more recent versions of Android releases.

title: Veterinary health record
description:
Veterinary health record is the first app for the continuity of care for all your pets. It allows you to easy record a complete profile of your animal, to create reminders for vaccines, surgeries or appointments to the veterinary doctor.... 

  - A complete overview of your animal, from its name to its weight chart.
  - Daily monitoring of treatments administered throughout its life.
  - Appointments monitoring (if routine visit (vaccination ...) or surgery) for those taken with your favorite veterinary doctor.
  - Contact details of the nearest veterinary doctors, farmers and emergencies wherever you are.
  - Printable document created in one click.
  - Data can be exported and imported from one device to an other.

The application is fully functional for a pet. If you want to add more than one, you can buy the premium version (in-app purchase). As a premium user, you have access to a dedicated backup service and to a website to more easily enter events. And that website can be easily used by your vet!

This app doesn’t replace a real (on paper) health record. It’s important to bring your pet’s health record every time you go to the veterinary doctor.  This app is designed to keep in your pocket every necessaries data on your pet at every moment.

For bug reporting or submiting ideas, feel free to contact us : emilionelandroid [at] gmail [dot] com
descriptionHTML:
Veterinary health record is the first app for the continuity of care for all your pets. It allows you to easy record a complete profile of your animal, to create reminders for vaccines, surgeries or appointments to the veterinary doctor....

- A complete overview of your animal, from its name to its weight chart.
- Daily monitoring of treatments administered throughout its life.
- Appointments monitoring (if routine visit (vaccination ...) or surgery) for those taken with your favorite veterinary doctor.
- Contact details of the nearest veterinary doctors, farmers and emergencies wherever you are.
- Printable document created in one click.
- Data can be exported and imported from one device to an other.

The application is fully functional for a pet. If you want to add more than one, you can buy the premium version (in-app purchase). As a premium user, you have access to a dedicated backup service and to a website to more easily enter events. And that website can be easily used by your vet!

This app doesn’t replace a real (on paper) health record. It’s important to bring your pet’s health record every time you go to the veterinary doctor. This app is designed to keep in your pocket every necessaries data on your pet at every moment.

For bug reporting or submiting ideas, feel free to contact us : emilionelandroid [at] gmail [dot] com
summary: All your pets' data permanently in your pocket!
recentChanges:
New server!
Improved User Interface
Premium : website available! Ask your vet to add to add events from our website!
Premium : add as many animals as you want!
Reminder for every event
New tab: invoices and reimbursements
New features in "about" page
Bug fixes
comments: I love this App. It is user friendly, capture info fast and I can access it anywhere. Thank you! One suggestion is to add Breed, Owner/client details, such as phone address email etc.

This application is great but if the developper could add a search button to allow browsing between the pets and it seems that you cannot add 2 pets with the same name!! Also if ypu can add in the dewormer section the dosage administered and if it is a shot rather than capsul or liquid! Other than that the app is great and easy to use!

Wasn't impressed. For being a no frills app, it's not as easy to set up as it should be. Wouldn't let me input a wt on the 3mos age because "this age already exists"... uh, no kidding, but there's no weight there beside the age, umm, hello? Couldn't change the wt from kg to lbs either. I'm just looking for a basic vaccine & weight record app, that's not connected to my vet, & that's SIMPLE 2 use... sorry but this isn't it.
Can only store one animals information and you can't really store anything beyond name and birth date without paying for the app.
Love the app. Easy to use. Keeps all my dogs' records in an easy to locate format. The only thing I would want to change is to add the option of entering weights in lbs, not just kg.

title: MesVaccins
description:
MesVaccins est le premier Carnet de Vaccination Électronique (CVE) intelligent, partagé et sécurisé pour smartphone. Il permet d'enregistrer facilement tous vos vaccins et de savoir immédiatement contre quelles maladies vous devriez être protégé. Cette application est une extension du site www.mesvaccins.net ; elle permet de gérer sur son smartphone son compte MesVaccins.net.

Pour être mieux vacciné, sans défaut ni excès.

1) Une vaccination personnalisée et intelligente

    Recommandations selon votre état de santé, vos conditions de vie ou de travail, votre entourage ou un éventuel voyage
    En cas de perte de votre carnet « papier », le CVE explique ce qu'il faut faire

2) Un carnet sécurisé et agréé

    Autorisation CNIL n° 1485378
    Hébergement agréé de données de santé (société IDS)
    Vous êtes maître de votre carnet et libre de le supprimer à tout moment

3) Un carnet partagé et officialisé

    Créez vous-même votre carnet
    Puis partagez-le avec votre médecin ou votre pharmacien, qui le validera
    Vous pouvez aussi demander à ce professionnel de le créer pour vous

4) L'historique de vos vaccins toujours disponible

    Rappels vaccinaux par courriel/SMS
    Accès à la liste des vaccins en cas d'urgence
    Évite les injections inutiles

5) Des conseils indépendants

    Outil géré par une association à but non lucratif
    Aucune participation de l'industrie pharmaceutique

6) Et enfin, c'est gratuit !

    Ce carnet est financé par les professionnels de santé
    Soutenu par l'URPS médecins libéraux d'Aquitaine
    Outil accessible à tous


Reconnus et soutenus par les autorités de santé, le CVE et le site MesVaccins.net ont été plusieurs fois récompensés ; en particulier, ils ont reçu en juillet 2012 le prix "technologies et services de la e-­santé" du Trophée de la e-­santé. Selon le Haut Conseil de la santé publique, le système expert du CVE de MesVaccins.net intègre en temps réel les évolutions des recommandations vaccinales et limite aussi bien les sous-vaccinations que les sur-vaccinations.

recentChanges: Correction d'un problème de lecture des codes datamatrix
comments: Ca peut mieux faire - liste des vaccinations en désordre!  La liste des vaccinations n'est pas triée en ordre chronologique.  Dommage!  Il faut savoir qu'on ne saisit pas systématiquement les vaccinations en ordre selon les années.  Mais le logiciel doit être assez intelligent à trier cette info. Imaginons qu'on saisit des vaccinations passées qu'on avait écrites sur une feuille. Et puis on retrouve une autre feuille par hasard sur d'autres vaccinations.  Voilà un cas classique.  D'ailleurs, ce sera bien si le logiciel permet de classer ou filtrer la liste selon le vaccin.

title: Women's Health Immunization
description:
Immunizations against harmful diseases play an important aspect of your personal health. Everyone needs them. Women’s Health Immunization is an app specially designed to guide you with your vaccination. It helps you to recognise the important vaccinations against diseases required, whether you have already been vaccinated against these diseases and when you need the next booster doses, if required. It also alerts you when the next doses are due.

Special care and dedication are taken to keep these apps simple and useful, and not too cumbersome to use.

recentChanges: Updated DTwP and DTaP information.
comments: Wonderful app.. Recommended for all those involved in care of children

OPV and HPV schedule is wrong. Some vaccine should be enlisted as optional one. TCV should not be recommended, unless union health ministry recommends. It is antipeople, antipoor, againt govt policies and misleading young paediatricians. How come vaccine schedule changes every year, in spite of no new vaccine is discovered. IAP is not a scientific body, it doesn't have any research facility.
very user friendly and informative , needs update from time to time , heart congrts CIAP ACVIP TEAM
Keeps on crashing when I try to add reminder for vaccination..
very less information , no catch up and missed dose schedule

title: Rabies - Vaccination Schedule
description: Application for calculating of the vaccination schedule for the prevention of rabies after bites and other contact with animals. Calculation is available for 2 major vaccines (COCAV and VERORAB) used in Russia, the CIS countries and a number of European countries. The application can be useful to traumatologists, surgeons, rabiologists, as well as patients injured in contact with animals, and their relatives.

title: Biloba - Vaccins des enfants
description:
Biloba est un outil simple et fiable qui vous aide à mieux comprendre les pages vaccinations du carnet de santé de votre enfant.

L'application est compatible avec tous les calendriers vaccinaux français pour les enfants nés après le 1er janvier 2002.

• VOTRE ENFANT EST-IL À JOUR DE SES VACCINS ? •
Biloba se base exclusivement sur les recommandations vaccinales actuelles du Ministère de la Santé et vous aide à comprendre la situation vaccinale de votre enfant.

• ANTICIPEZ LES PROCHAINS VACCINS À FAIRE •
Biloba vous notifie des prochains vaccins à réaliser. Cela vous permet d'anticiper votre prise de rendez-vous chez le médecin et votre passage à la pharmacie.

• LES DONNÉES VACCINALES, TOUJOURS SUR VOUS, JAMAIS PERDUES •
Vous êtes l'unique propriétaire des données de votre enfant et pouvez demander à Biloba la suppression totale de votre compte à tout moment. Ces données sont stockées sur un serveur sécurisé et personne n'y a accès. 

• 100% INDÉPENDANT •
Biloba est une application INDÉPENDANTE. Nous ne sommes en lien avec aucune entreprise de l'industrie pharmaceutique. 
Biloba n'affichera jamais de publicité dans l'application. Personne ne peut ainsi rémunérer Biloba pour mettre en avant ses produits ou ses idées.

• MANIFESTO •
Nous avons écrit un manifesto pour expliquer pourquoi nous avons créé Biloba, et comment cet outil peut avoir un impact majeur sur la problématique de sous-vaccination en France : http://get.bilo.ba/manifesto

• PRÉCAUTIONS D'UTILISATION •
Biloba est un outil d'aide à la compréhension des vaccins. Il ne se substitue pas à l'avis d’un professionnel de la santé légalement habilité. En cas de doute, contactez votre médecin.


Vous avez des questions ? N'hésitez pas à nous envoyer un message à bonjour@bilo.ba

title: PneumoRecs VaxAdvisor
description:
This is the PneumoRecs VaxAdvisor App created by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) in collaboration with the Georgia Tech Research Institute. PneumoRecs VaxAdvisor provides patient-specific pneumococcal vaccination guidance consistent with the pneumococcal vaccination recommendations of the Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices. Vaccination providers enter a patient’s age and respond to prompts about the patient’s pneumococcal vaccination history and underlying medical conditions. The app then displays patient-specific pneumococcal vaccination recommendations consistent with the recommended U.S. immunization schedule.

Optimized for tablet.

For more information, please visit: 

https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/vpd/pneumo/hcp/index.html

Vaccination providers enter a patient’s age and respond to prompts about the patient’s pneumococcal vaccination history and underlying medical conditions. The app then displays patient-specific pneumococcal vaccination recommendations consistent with the recommended U.S. immunization schedule.

https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/vpd/pneumo/hcp/index.html
summary: PneumoRecs VaxAdvisor gives patient-specific pneumococcal vaccination guidance.
developer: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
recentChanges: Corrected Risk Factor List for pediatric populations.
comments: Only tried this a few times. I like the concept behind this. I would probably give 5 🌟 (stars) if not for 2 initial complaints: 1) too time consuming to enter in pt date of birth (recom to type in or select age - would be easier/faster than the DOB, especially scrolling to the birth year for elderly pts). 2) once pt 65+ yo, the risk factors are no longer applicable (as age itself is the risk for both PCV13 & PPSV23 for shared decision). Only previous vax history is applicable once 65+.
This only is for an individual schedule. No ingredients nor proper display of risks. This is just a scheduler and does not navigate well. Practically useless. Whoever wrote for nurses is ignorant .
Great new nurse guide

title: CANImmunize
description:
CANImmunize is a digital tool for Canadians that securely stores your vaccination records and helps you get vaccinated on time. 

You can use CANImmunize to:
Track childhood, adult, and travel vaccinations for yourself and your family members.
Receive reminders about upcoming vaccinations right to your home screen. 
Stay up-to-date with the vaccination schedule of your Canadian province or territory.
Create customized vaccination schedules for family members receiving travel or other types of vaccines.
Learn about outbreaks of vaccine-preventable diseases in your area.
Access information and resources about vaccination from trusted Canadian health sources.
Have fun learning about vaccinations with games, videos, and a comic book.
descriptionHTML:
CANImmunize is a digital tool for Canadians that securely stores your vaccination records and helps you get vaccinated on time.

You can use CANImmunize to:
Track childhood, adult, and travel vaccinations for yourself and your family members.
Receive reminders about upcoming vaccinations right to your home screen.
Stay up-to-date with the vaccination schedule of your Canadian province or territory.
Create customized vaccination schedules for family members receiving travel or other types of vaccines.
Learn about outbreaks of vaccine-preventable diseases in your area.
Access information and resources about vaccination from trusted Canadian health sources.
Have fun learning about vaccinations with games, videos, and a comic book.
summary: Vaccination tracking made easy
recentChanges:
Updates in this release include:
- Bulk Enter Vaccines: save time and enter multiple vaccinations at once
- Upload/Capture Documents: upload photos or documents of paper vaccination records and serology reports. Store this in your CANImmunize account so that it's all in one place.
- Capture a healthcare provider's signature to prove you received the vaccine.
- Report Your Immunizations to your Employer: This feature is only available to employees of participating organizations.
comments: Nice app. One issue I've run into is that the calendar function requires that I manually go back month by month to my bday. I've avoided adding my record as I don't feel like clicking back to get to 1982. Is there a way to manually enter the date for a bday?

Keeps losing record. I create a record for my child, as the immunizations she receives. The next time I go to login to record the next round, that record is gone. Kind of useless if it constantly forgets everything

Good app, should be able to also understand that a Hexa Vaccine covers a penta vaccine. It should be built understanding that combination vaccines are essentially multi vaccines and are Substitutable by others as long as all doses are provided.Dtap is Substitutable by DTwP and so thought it understands this in case of Tdap/Td/TT. Otherwise it is one of the best apps. Another feature that can be added is optional vaccines that people have missed in their childhood may be able to get now.

Love the idea of having a record at your fingertips. Some immunization names are confusing.... names don't always match the doctors records. It would be nice to have a search feature instead of scrolling through the lists of the different immunizations. Especially when you don't know which category the one you are looking for is in. ie. adult, other, travel.
If I could move this app to my SD card instead of internal storgage I would keep it. I understand this is the developer's choice and may only be an isue for android users.

title: Docket™ - Official Immunization Records
description:
Docket™ is back in action to make it easier than ever for you to access personal and family immunization records directly from the Utah Department of Health. Track upcoming shots, review past immunizations, and share your official immunization reports.

- Back-to-school proof of immunizations
- Your official Utah immunization forecast
- Add your kids, track upcoming shots, and more

Check us out at docket.care.

Please contact us at info@hellodocket.com if you have any questions.

recentChanges: expand / collapse patient records
comments: The Docket team was extremely helpful in resolving my issues right away. If it seems like you are stuck in an infinite loop without being able to access your records, just change the text size settings on your device and you should be able to access your records.
This app is useless to me as it will not stay open. I have no access to what I need.

Only reason I didn't give it one star is this is a good idea. I would love an easy way to stay on top of my kids vaccines but this isn't it. Couldn't create an account because, though I filled out all required fields and used a multi-character long password, the "create account" button doesn't work. Had to use my Google account to log in. Every time you open it it takes you through as though it's your first time. Searched for my child's records, not found. Good idea, failed execution.
Doesn't load anything

title: All Pediatric Diseases
description:
Viral infections are common among people of all ages but often seem to be concentrated in infants and children. Most childhood viral infections are not serious and include such diverse illnesses as colds, sore throat, vomiting and diarrhea, and fever with a rash. Some viral illnesses that cause more serious disease, such as measles, are less common now due to widespread immunization. Several types of viral infections that children can acquire are discussed in adult viral infections.

Generally, parents can tell whether their child is ill with a potentially serious infection and needs immediate medical care. This is particularly true for children beyond infancy. Many viral infections are so distinctive that a doctor can diagnose them based on their symptoms. A doctor usually does not need to have a laboratory identify the specific virus involved.

Most children with viral infections get better without treatment. Many viral infections result in fever and body aches or discomfort. Doctors sometimes treat these symptoms with acetaminophen or ibuprofen. Aspirin is not given to children or adolescents with these symptoms because it increases the risk of Reye syndrome in those who have certain viral infections. Antibiotics cannot cure viral infections. However, there are antiviral drugs available for a few viral infections such as hepatitis, some herpesviruses, influenza, and human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).
descriptionHTML:
Viral infections are common among people of all ages but often seem to be concentrated in infants and children. Most childhood viral infections are not serious and include such diverse illnesses as colds, sore throat, vomiting and diarrhea, and fever with a rash. Some viral illnesses that cause more serious disease, such as measles, are less common now due to widespread immunization. Several types of viral infections that children can acquire are discussed in adult viral infections.

Generally, parents can tell whether their child is ill with a potentially serious infection and needs immediate medical care. This is particularly true for children beyond infancy. Many viral infections are so distinctive that a doctor can diagnose them based on their symptoms. A doctor usually does not need to have a laboratory identify the specific virus involved.

Most children with viral infections get better without treatment. Many viral infections result in fever and body aches or discomfort. Doctors sometimes treat these symptoms with acetaminophen or ibuprofen. Aspirin is not given to children or adolescents with these symptoms because it increases the risk of Reye syndrome in those who have certain viral infections. Antibiotics cannot cure viral infections. However, there are antiviral drugs available for a few viral infections such as hepatitis, some herpesviruses, influenza, and human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).

title: EPI HPC
description:
শিশুদের জন্ম তারিখ অনুযায়ী পেন্টাভেলেন্ট-১ / পিসিভি-১, এমআর এবং হামের টিকা দেওয়া হয়। যারা টিকা  দেন তাদের জন্য জন্ম তারিখ এর উপর ভিত্তি করে টিকা দেওয়ার  তারিখ বের করতে হয়। তাদের তারিখ বের করতে সময় নষ্ট এবং  কষ্ট দুইই  হয়। এই কষ্ট এবং সময় নষ্ট বাচানোর জন্য আমরা ছোট্ট একটি চেষ্টা করেছি । আলহামদুলিল্লাহ, আমরা একটি এনড্রোয়েড অ্যাপ (ইপিআই এইচপিসি) তৈরি করেছি যার মাধ্যমে জন্ম তারিখ ইনপুট দেওয়ার সাথে সাথে টিকা দেওয়ার তারিখ গুলা দেখাবে। আমরা আশা করছি এর মাধ্যমে সময় এবং শ্রম একটু হলেও সাশ্রয় করা যাবে।
This app totally based on offline database. So please make a Hardcopy of your data. Cause by crassing apps or your phone data maybe lost.

title: Dog Health
description:
Put the health of our 4-legged friends in the first place.
Dog Health is a completely free application that helps you to follow the best health of your dogs, memorizing their history and remembering any visits, administrations and scheduled medication.

With this application you can:

- Store your dog's personal data such as name, weight, date of birth, chip.
- Keep track of all previous and future visits.
- Keep track of vaccinations.
- Remember appointment and visits.
- Store all medication administration done or to be done.
- Manage your vets.
- Find and contact the nearest veterinarian.
- Manage multiple dogs.
- Backup/Restore

Enable the pro version for more features:

- Storage the trend of the dog's weight over time
- Storage the trend of the dog's height over time
- Choosing units of measure (grams/pounds and m/inches)
- Many more coming soon...

Easily create reminders and receive dosage, appointment and visits alerts

What are you waiting, download Dog Health and take care of your puppies.

(Dog Health is constantly evolving, please do not hesitate if you have any reports or advice from us)

comments: I love this app. It has the categories I need to keep track of everything relevant to my dog's health and medical record. I can't remember all that stuff and lose the paperwork, so this is great for me. Also comes in handy at the vet if I need to describe any symptoms; they're already in my notes in the app. I really like that it's streamlined and categorizes my info clearly. Highly recommend. Have not downloaded the upgrades, as I don't want to take the chance any of my data will be affected.

There are limited good apps for pet management. this app is very good with an easy interface. I strongly recommend it for pet owners that don't need to share the info with someone else. However for two partners caring for a pet it becomes cumbersome as the changes aren't shared across the cloud. Please add this feature!
Doesn't allow for backup or storage on SD card. Add to that, the online backup didn't save my pet records, so when I switched phones, I lost the records. VERY frustrating.
Very nice. Simple and easy to use. It would be nice if I could see photos of all my pets in the start screen together and choose from the photos 🙂

sucks u can only add one pet unlike the others. i have two and if u give access to ur location it forces u to choose only ir local vets which is dumb since my vet i trust is an hour away and no way around it. really dumb app uninstalling. go with the others seriously

title: FirstStep Baby Health
description:
FirstStep is a child health management tool for parents who want to keep track of the most important aspects of their baby’s health and well being. The app helps parents record, track and monitor immunizations, growth and development. 

IMMUNIZATIONS: 
With the FirstStep app, you get access to the most comprehensive immunization plan in your country. With personalized due dates, an intelligent tracking system and reminders, you will not forget important vaccination dates.
 
GROWTH CHARTS: 
You can record and monitor your baby’s growth consistently, and have the most up-to-date growth records to share with your child’s doctor. 

DEVELOPMENTAL MILESTONES:
The FirstStep app contains over 120 developmental (movement, emotional/social, cognitive and communication/language) milestones with the respective recommended age ranges*. Regularly keeping track of and recording these milestones will allow you to share this very important data with your child’s doctor when they conduct periodic developmental screenings and evaluations. 

MEMORIES:
You can record memories of precious milestones and special moments with your baby - The Memory Lane will keep these memories as a timeline for you to have a unique album of your first years together! 

HEALTH RECORDS: 
You can download and share your child’s comprehensive health report, with the updated records of all vaccinations, growth charts and developmental milestones, as a 'pdf', from the app. The updated records are synced to your private and secure account on the cloud. So, you can ensure that you have your child’s records for life! Even if you lose your phone or uninstall the app, FirstStep will ensure you have access to your child's health data forever.

Please feel free to write to us at firststep@wayuhealth.com with any suggestions, questions or comments. FirstStep is here to help you understand and keep track of your child's physical and cognitive development.

*Important note: The vaccination schedules provided in the app are based on recommendations by the World Health Organisation (WHO), as well as the national/provincial immunization programs in your country. This app serves as a guide and reminder tool, and is not meant to offer medical advice. Vaccination delay calibrations are based on the schedules & recommendations provided by WHO, and your respective country’s immunization program. 
Data for the growth curves is taken from the WHO Multicentre Growth Reference Study, which provides a single international standard for physiological growth in children up to age 5. 
Developmental Milestones are adapted from the information provided by CDC and American Academy of Pediatrics. The app module is not meant to replace standardised development screenings and evaluations provided by a medical professional.

title: Vaccine Record for Travellers
description:
Record details of your vaccines, and have those details to hand when needed, either by referring to the app, or emailing a summary. 
Losing your vaccination records will cost you time, money, and pain in the arm when you have vaccines repeated.
Vaccine Record also allows you to set reminder alerts, so your technology will remind them when vaccines need to be updated. 
You can even store a photograph of your vaccine records and especially your yellow fever certificate in your device.
There is currently a paper-based International Vaccine Record that is carried by travellers world wide. This app is the digital version.
This app was developed by Dr Deb Mills, a Travel Medicine specialist for over 25 years.
