title: IVACCINE INDIA
description:
Immunisation protects the community against vaccine-preventable diseases. Each vaccine plays an important role, so timely vaccination is the best way to protect your child. This App offers parents access to comprehensive information on immunisation as well as the following, easy-to-use free tools designed to help you save the date to vaccinate.



Why Vaccinate?

- Vaccination is the best way to protect your child from serious diseases.

- By vaccinating you are protecting your child as well as the broader community.

- The more people vaccinate their children, the more we can control serious vaccine-preventable diseases.




When to Vaccinate?

- The immunisation schedule provides a summary of the vaccines that your child needs and the ages at which they should be given.

- Delaying vaccination when your little one is feeling off colour is a normal response. But the truth is, even if they have a runny nose or slight cold they can still receive their shots. Read more

- Timely vaccination is the best way to keep your child protected from serious vaccine-preventable diseases. So book ahead, make an appointment with your doctor. Download one of our handy tools to help you save the date to vaccinate.

title: MS Vaccines
description:
The application of my son's vaccines is an application that alerts parents to vaccinate their children according to the vaccine schedule
Prepared by the Ministry of Health. The application was prepared and implemented by the Diyala Health Department under the supervision of the esteemed Director General
Dr. Ali Hussein Hassan Al - Tamimi
By the engineer performing for the work of Aws Mohammed Al Khazraji.
The Director General of Diyala Health Department stressed the need to spread this achievement to the health services throughout the country to facilitate the parents and the process of regular vaccination of their children to avoid diseases and epidemics, God save our sons of Iraq from all disease and evil.

title: 질병관리청 예방접종도우미
description:
■ 모바일용 예방접종 아기수첩 출시
우리아이 예방접종 관리 ! 스마트폰 안으로 쏙~ 초보맘, 워킹맘의 필수 다운로드 어플리케이션

“예방접종도우미” 앱을 이용하면 그동안 자녀가 받은 예방접종 기록을 스마트폰으로 손쉽게 조회할 수 있고, 아기 정보를 등록해 놓으면 다음 예방접종 일정에 맞춰 알람 서비스를 받을 수 있습니다. 국가예방접종을 보다 저렴하게 받을 수 있는 을 검색할 수 있습니다.

■ 어플리케이션 특징
  ㅇ 아기관리 및 완전 접종률, 아기성장그래프 기능
  ㅇ 국가 예방접종 기록 데이터베이스에 등록된 예방접종 기록 조회
     (모바일 아기수첩 기능, 의료기관 및 보건소에서 등록한 예방접종 기록에 한해 조회가능)
  ㅇ 누락된 예방접종기록 및 다음 예방접종 일정보기 기능
  ㅇ 다음 접종일정에 맞춰 알람 서비스 제공
  ㅇ 출생일 기준 국가 예방접종 및 기타 예방접종 스케줄 한눈에 보기
  ㅇ 보건소 및 예방접종 비용 지원 의료기관 조회 기능
  ㅇ 예방접종 전·후 주의사항 등 안전한 예방접종을 위한 정보제공
  ㅇ 감염병 의학정보 및 치료, 예방법 안내

■ 예방접종도우미 누리집(http://nip.cdc.go.kr)에서 공인인증서를 등록하시면 공인인증서로 로그인이 가능합니다.
   자세한 사항은 예방접종도우미 누리집을 참고하여주시기 바랍니다.

■ 공공기관의 개인정보 보호를 위하여 비밀번호가 5회이상 틀릴경우 로그인이 제한됩니다.
  예방접종도우미 누리집에서 임시 비밀번호를 발급 받아서 사용하거나 질병관리본부 예방접종관리과로 직접 전화주셔도 됩니다. (연락처 - 043)719-8397~8399)

■ 예방접종도우미 앱을 사용하면서 발견되는 오류 및 업데이트가 필요한 사항은 예방접종도우미앱의 묻고답하기를 참고하여주시기 바랍니다.

■  해당앱은 처음 설치시에 80mb의 데이터통화량을 요구하오니 가급적 WI-FI 환경에서 설치하여주시기 바랍니다.

■ 예방접종도우미 앱을 사용하면서 발견되는 오류 및 업데이트가 필요한 사항은 예방접종도우미앱의 묻고답하기를 참고하여주시기 바랍니다.

■ 해당앱은 처음 설치시에 80mb의 데이터통화량을 요구하오니 가급적 WI-FI 환경에서 설치하여주시기 바랍니다.

title: Parenting - Pediatric Oncall
description:
Pediatric Oncall Parenting app provides to you Parents all the basic and daily needed important tools!!!
All App features are completely free! However users are required to login for complete access!
App Tools:
Diseases and Conditions, Medical Calculators, Ask a Doctor, Diet and Diseases, Alternative Medicines, Vaccination Centre, Pedi Poll, Videos, Diagnostic Aid and Search Directory.
This App is connected to www.PediatricOncall.com which is a medical website with over 40 tools for medical personnel and parents. Pediatric Oncall also provides medical information on pediatrics, symptoms, medicine and child health. Register yourself to Pediatric Oncall and access all these features.
-- Diseases and Conditions – Patient Education on various health topics.
-- Medical Calculators - More than 15 calculators which include the categories, growth, conversion, pregnancy, etc.
-- Ask a Doctor -- Pediatric Oncall’s expert panel of doctor’s answer to your medical queries and common FAQ’s.
-- Search Directory – Hospitals, Medical Colleges, Residency, NGO and Special Schools.
-- Vaccination Centre -- Articles on Immunization & Vaccine Reminder Tool to keep track of your child’s vaccination history with reminders.
-- Diagnostic Aid -- Get a differential diagnosis after entering the clinical features.
-- Pedi Poll -- Voting and reviews on the recent updates.
-- Videos -- Pediatric Oncall’s video section with lectures and conference videos.

For any queries, suggestions and feedback you can mail to us at feedback@pediatriconcall.com
*Data services are required to access most sections of the application.

title: CDC TravWell
description:
CDC’s TravWell app helps you plan for safe and healthy international travel. Build a trip to get destination-specific vaccine recommendations, a checklist of what you need to do to prepare for travel, and a customizable healthy travel packing list. The app also lets you store travel documents, keep a record of your medications and immunizations, and set reminders to get vaccine booster doses or take medicines while you’re traveling.
Key Features
•	Authoritative recommendations from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
•	During-travel features available offline (no data connection needed)
•	Fully customizable to do list and packing list
•	Emergency services phone numbers for every destination
•	Easy to use and fun

summary: Plan for healthy and safe international travel with CDC’s TravWell app.
developer: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
recentChanges: Imports trip information entered in previous app versions
comments: Some useful information but still needs a lot of work. It's impossible to edit traveler's details, like vaccines and documents, only through a trip. UX is poor where the back button takes you back through all the pages you visited since you opened the app.

Not very useful anymore. Used to show which vaccines are indicated for which countries. Now very consumer-oriented and does not give much scientific information at all. I used to recommend this to my patients yet not anymore.
As many other users said, it would be very helpful if you could see the suggested vaccines without entering the travel details, as it's possible on the website.
I cannot select the destination on the add travel page. wth! looked like it would have been a great app! so sad!
it should be a replica of information ibn the website and not trip based. even after you enter trip details it doesn't show the recommended vaccines.

title: Tat3eem Reminder
description:
Tat3eem provides permanently complete information about vaccines. This main module also includes the official vaccination calendar of Egypt as well as information about the recommended vaccinations. The module generates automatically a proposal of personalized vaccines calendar ones the user has registered in the App and introduced his parameters (age, sex, etc.). Moreover, it provides alerts and reminders of vaccines and doses by performing the follow-up of the citizen vaccines administrations. The App is multiuser, including various individuals of the same family what help parents to learn and manage the vaccination of all their children from the same App.
The described solution responds to the needs of Egyptian parents to have a tool for acquiring vaccine information and tracking its administration. The App provides the needed information to follow the vaccination program of their children in a structured and event-based way so that parents do not feel overwhelmed with all the information in the process. The App generates a personalized administration calendar depending on the user’s parameters.

title: STD Tx Guide
description:
The STD Tx Guide app is a quick reference guide for healthcare professionals and related parties on the identification of and treatment for sexually transmitted diseases.  

With the STD Tx Guide app you get:

•	Fast access to recommended treatment regimens
•	List of common Terms and Abbreviations
•	Includes CDC’s guide to Taking a Sexual History
•	Push notifications for guideline updates


The app is a collaboration between CDC's Division of STD Prevention and the Informatics Innovation Unit (IIU) within CDC's Division of Public Health Information Dissemination (DPHID) - Center for Surveillance, Epidemiology and Laboratory Services (CSELS).

These guidelines for the treatment of persons who have or are at risk for sexually transmitted diseases (STDs) were updated by CDC after consultation with a group of professionals knowledgeable in the field of STDs who met in Atlanta on April 30–May 2, 2013. The information in this report updates the Sexually Transmitted Diseases Treatment Guidelines, 2010 (MMWR Recomm Rep 2010;59 [No. RR–12]). These updated guidelines discuss 1) alternative treatment regimens for Neisseria gonorrhoeae; 2) the use of nucleic acid amplification tests for the diagnosis of trichomoniasis; 3) alternative treatment options for genital warts; 4) the role of Mycoplasma genitalium in urethritis/cervicitis and treatment-related implications; 5) updated HPV vaccine recommendations and counseling messages; 6) the management of persons who are transgender; 7) annual testing for hepatitis C in persons with HIV infection; 8) updated recommendations for diagnostic evaluation of urethritis; and 9) retesting to detect repeat infection. Physicians and other health-care providers can use these guidelines to assist in the prevention and treatment of STDs.

title: Kid-E-Cats: Picnic with Three Cats! Kitty Cat!
description:
It's picnic time! Play little and big kid games and have a picnic with Kid-E-Cats! A lot of kids games and activities waiting for you in games for children 3 and under! 🐾🍢

Kid-E-Cats are going on a picnic 🍢🍡♨️🍔 to play cat games for kids with fancy cats!
Bring some yummy food, choose kitty cat friends to come with you, feed everyone and enjoy a cozy evening by the campfire. 🐾🐾
Three kittens from the popular Russian cartoon for kids "Kid-E-Cats" go out of town. They want to have a picnic with kids games and activities and you're invited too! 🐾
🐱Play cartoon children game and help them take some food to the forest: Mother Cat knows just what her family loves to eat, follow her instructions to pick up the right food. 
🐱Choose your favorite cartoon characters to invite and play with him kitty cat games for kids! You can pick different characters each time you go. 🐾
🐱Play big kid games and avoid obstacles on your way to the forest. 
🐱Lay the table on the spot, catch fish 🐟 🐠, collect berries or mushrooms 🍇🍒🍄, play with butterflies and feed every member of the cats' family!

📲 Download this children game “Kid-E-Cats: Picnic with Three Cats! Kitty Cat!” and have adventures with three cats in these kids games and activities! You will definitely like these games for children 3 and under with kitty! The game is simple and colorful, so even the youngest players can go on interesting missions and play games. Have adventures with fancy cats! 🐱

title: কোন রোগের কি টিকা
description:
মানুষে কনো রোগি চিরতরে সেরে যায় না,রোগ এর কায্য পক্রিয়া ঔষধের দ্বরা কিছুটা দমিয়ে রাখা সম্বব তা আবার যত দিন ঔষধ খাবেন ততোদিন সুস্থ থাকবেন। 

বর্তমান পৃথিবীতে রোগের ধরনের শেষ নেই দৈনিক নতুন নতুন রোগে সৃষ্টি হচ্ছে,তার পাশাপাশি তৈরি হচ্ছে নতুন চিকিৎসা ও ঔষধ কিছু কিছু নির্দিষ্ট রোগের ঔষধের পাশাপাশি তৈরি হচ্ছে টিকা বা টিকা যা দ্বারা ঔষধের ছেয়ে বেশি দিন সুস্থ থাকা সম্বব।

টিকা হলো Immunoglbulin  যা শরিরে প্রবেশ করিয়ে দিলে রোগের Antigen এর বিরুদ্ধে Antibody তৈরি করে রোগ প্রতিরোধ করে, যা দ্বারা দৃর্ঘ্য সময় আরোগ্য লাভ করা যায়।

এই অ্যাপটিতে আপনি যা দেওয়া হলো


১ যক্ষা রোগের টিকা।
২ পোলিও রোগের টিকা।
৩ ডিপথেরিয়া, হুপিং কাশি ও ধনুষ্টংকার৷
৪ হামের ওরুবেলার টিকা।
৫ কুকুর,বিড়াল কামড়ালে টিকা।
৬ টাইফয়েড বিরুদ্ধে টিকা।
৭ ত্বক কেটে গেলে টিটেনাস টিকা।
৮ মেনিনজাইটিস সি টিকা।
৯ হেপাটাইটিস বি টিকা।
১০ চিকেনপক্সের টিকা।
১১ মেয়েদের টিটি টিকা।
১২ এম আর (MR) টীকা।
১৩ শিশুদের টিকা দেয়ার সময়সূচি।
১৪ অ্যান্টিবডির পরিমাণ বাড়াতে টিকা।
১৫ বিশেষ কিছু টিকা।
১৬ টিকাদান কর্মসূচি (ইপিআই)।
১৭ শিশুর টিকার তালিকা।

আমাদের অ্যাপটি ভালো লাগলে রেটিং শেয়ার করুন

title: HPV Vaccine: Same Way, Same Day
description:
For pediatricians or PCPs looking to improve HPV vaccine rates, communication is key. In this simulation, you will practice techniques to introduce and discuss the vaccine with parents and young patients, including those who may be hesitant to immunize. 

HPV vaccines are one of the safest and most effective vaccines with a huge potential to save lives, yet have one of the lowest usage rates. HPV Vaccine: Same Way, Same Day™ is a role-play simulation where you play the role of a pediatrician and engage in a series of practice conversations with a virtual family. Through these scenarios, you will learn how to:
- Introduce the vaccine in the same way and on the same day as other vaccines
- Confidently recommend the vaccine 
- Effectively answer questions about effectiveness and safety

In your practice, you may encounter parents who seem hesitant about the HPV vaccine. Using techniques drawn from Motivational Interviewing, you will practice shared decision-making with families by asking open-ended questions, reflecting their concerns, showing empathy, and respectfully sharing information. By following these techniques, your trusted opinion can overcome a parent’s hesitation about the HPV vaccine for their child.

* FEATURES
- Learn about the HPV vaccine and strategies for broaching it with parents.
- Engage in a series of simulated role-play conversations with a fully animated parent and her child, while receiving personalized feedback from a virtual coach.
- Access resources about HPV vaccinations and motivational interviewing.

HPV Vaccine: Same Way Same Day was developed by the Academic Pediatric Association, the American Academy of Pediatrics, and Kognito™.

title: ワクチンノート－赤ちゃんの予防接種スケジュールをかんたん管理－
description:
大事な赤ちゃんを病気から守るために欠かせない予防接種。 
ワクチンノートはこれまで受けた予防接種とこれからの予防接種スケジュール登録管理することができるアプリです。

◆主な機能
- ワクチン接種管理機能 -
・スケジュール管理機能
・接種時期のめやす、接種間隔表示機能
・接種記録機能
・複数人のワクチン登録機能
・ワクチン一括登録・変更機能
・接種日前アラート機能

- ひとこと日記機能 -
・写真やスタンプ付きの日記機能
・赤ちゃんの表情スタンプ
・誕生日スタンプ

- 成長記録機能 -
・赤ちゃんの身長記録・グラフ化機能（成長曲線付き）
・赤ちゃんの体重記録・グラフ化機能（成長曲線付き）


※本アプリは、ワクチンスケジュール管理の補助としてお使いいただくものです。実際の接種にあたっては、かかりつけ医と相談のうえスケジュールを決定してください。
※本アプリに関するお問い合わせは「設定＞よくある質問」からお願いいたします。

title: PETMOOBY - PET, VACCINES, TIPS, TREATMENT AND MORE
description:
PETMOOBY is the perfect application for you that wants to take good care of your PET but it does not always remind you of the day of the vaccine and the medicines you have to give. We will remind you and help you take better care of your pet.


Features of PETMOOBY:


- Register your animals.


- Register the vaccines of your PETS and receive notifications to remind you of the correct vaccination day.


- Register your PETS medicines and receive notifications to remind you of the correct day of medication.


- Calendar with dates of vaccines and medicines.


- Register the veterinary care and exams.


- Tips and Curiosities of the PET WORLD.

title: শিশুর ওজন বাড়াতে ৭ টি খাবার baby food tips
description:
আমাদের জীবনের সবচেয়ে মূল্যবান সময় হচ্ছে আমাদের শিশুকাল।আমাদের বাবা মা পরম যত্ন ও পরিচর্যার মাধ্যমে আমাদের বড় করে তুলেছেন।সময়ের সাথে আমরা যখন বাবা মা হই তখন আমরা বোঝে উঠতে পারিনা কিভাবে বাচ্চার যত্ন নিব কিংবা খাবার দাবার এর বিষয় টা।আমাদের আজকের এই অ্যাপ এর মূল বিষয় হচ্ছে শিশুর খাদ্য তালিকা কিংবা শিশুর ওজন বাড়াতে প্রয়োজনীয় সব কিছু সম্পর্কে তুলে ধরা।আমরা স্বাস্থ্য টিপস জানব, স্বাস্থ্য টিপস ও জানব কোন খাবার এ কোন ভিটামিন বিদ্যমান।শিশুর বয়সভেদে ওজন চার্ট জানা অত্যন্ত জরুরি।তাই আশা করব সবাই বেবি ফুড সম্পর্কিত এই অ্যাপ টি সবার খুব কাজে লাগবে।আসুন দেখে নেই অ্যাপ টি থেকে কি কি পাচ্ছেনঃশিশুর ওজন বাড়াতে ৭ টি খাবার,শিশুর খাদ্য তালিকা ও শিশুর খাবার,কিভাবে করবেন শিশুর যত্ন,নবজাতক শিশুর যত্ন,কোন খাবারে কত ক্যালরি বা ভিটামিন,পুষ্টিকর খাদ্য ও উচ্চতা অনুযায়ী আদর্শ ওজন ইত্যাদি।

আমাদের জীবনের সবচেয়ে মূল্যবান সময় হচ্ছে আমাদের শিশুকাল।আমাদের বাবা মা পরম যত্ন ও পরিচর্যার মাধ্যমে আমাদের বড় করে তুলেছেন।সময়ের সাথে আমরা যখন বাবা মা হই তখন আমরা বোঝে উঠতে পারিনা কিভাবে বাচ্চার যত্ন নিব কিংবা খাবার দাবার এর বিষয় টা।আমাদের আজকের এই অ্যাপ এর মূল বিষয় হচ্ছে শিশুর খাদ্য তালিকা কিংবা শিশুর ওজন বাড়াতে প্রয়োজনীয় সব কিছু সম্পর্কে তুলে ধরা।আমরা স্বাস্থ্য টিপস জানব, স্বাস্থ্য টিপস ও জানব কোন খাবার এ কোন ভিটামিন বিদ্যমান।শিশুর বয়সভেদে ওজন চার্ট জানা অত্যন্ত জরুরি।তাই আশা করব সবাই বেবি ফুড সম্পর্কিত এই অ্যাপ টি সবার খুব কাজে লাগবে।আসুন দেখে নেই অ্যাপ টি থেকে কি কি পাচ্ছেনঃশিশুর ওজন বাড়াতে ৭ টি খাবার,শিশুর খাদ্য তালিকা ও শিশুর খাবার,কিভাবে করবেন শিশুর যত্ন,নবজাতক শিশুর যত্ন,কোন খাবারে কত ক্যালরি বা ভিটামিন,পুষ্টিকর খাদ্য ও উচ্চতা অনুযায়ী আদর্শ ওজন ইত্যাদি।

title: CDC Yellow Book
description:
Preview, Buy, or Sign In using this app.

FREE PREVIEW – Experience the Yellow Book to see the value of having trusted travel information when and where it's needed. 

ABOUT YELLOW BOOK
The fully revised and updated CDC Yellow Book app delivers the U.S. government’s most current travel health guidelines, including pre-travel vaccine recommendations, destination-specific health advice, and easy-to-reference maps, tables, and charts. Authored by a team of the world’s most esteemed travel medicine experts, this app best codifies the U.S. Government’s latest travel guidelines to staying healthy anywhere in the world. 

Review dedicated topics on emerging infectious disease threats such as Zika, Ebola, and MERS, new cholera vaccine recommendations, updated guidance on the use of antibiotics to treat traveler’s diarrhea, special considerations for unique types of travel (i.e. wilderness expeditions, work-related travel, and studying abroad), and fully revised advice for specific destinations in international travel.

FEATURES
•	Pre-travel vaccinations and preventative care
•	Destination specific guidelines with sections on Cuba and Burma
•	Advice for travelers with specific health needs (pregnant women, travelers with chronic illness, etc.)
•	Practical tips for last minute or resource limited travelers
•	Recommendations for air crews, humanitarian workers, missionaries, and others who provide care and support overseas
•	Easy to use reference maps, tables, and charts
•	Notes for making custom notes and highlights within entries
•	Full Text Search to find specific topics quickly
•	"Favorites" for bookmarking important topics

EDITOR-IN-CHIEF: Gary W. Brunette

Publisher: Oxford University Press

Powered by: Unbound Medicine

title: KinderPass: Baby Development, Learning & Parenting
description:
New- All premium features are now FREE for families with a child below 2 yrs of age!

KinderPass - Your personal child development guide, with 1200+ Play to learn activities created for babies, toddlers and pre-schoolers, by early childhood experts.


Get 1200+ personalised developmental activities and ideas for 0-4 years old kids so you can be confident of giving your little one the best start in life. At home learning, homeschooling, Montessori activities- we have you covered.

Early Years Matter

Your little one’s first few years are the most critical for their development. It’s when their brain is forming one million neural connections per second. (source: Center on the Developing Child, 2007. The Science of Early Childhood Development (InBrief). Retrieved from www.developingchild.harvard.edu.). And that’s when they need lots of stimulating activities and opportunities to explore, experiment, and experience the world around them.

Made for parents by childhood experts and parents

We’re parents too – we get it. You’re buried under that mountain of to-do’s, and there’s never enough time. We’ve done the research so you don’t have to. We have decoded all the science, and wisdom, passed it through a filter of “real life” and created KinderPass- a neat app that gives you activities that are personalized for your child’s age and development needs and yet, fits your busy schedule. No preparation or expensive material needed. Bond with your baby and keep toddlers engaged without any screens!

Now, make all interactions with your child into meaningful, brain building moments!

KinderPass gives you age based personalised activity plans, baby development milestone tracking information, articles and experts’ advice on everything related to child development, from breastfeeding, tummy time, baby’s first foods, child health, home remedies, sleep, art & craft activities and everything in between, so you are covered for all situations- be it baby massage, travel, playdate ideas or pre-school show and tell! 
 
Features:
- Get access to 1200+ at-home activities and ideas so you can give your child the best start.
- Learn about how you can support your child’s development, what activities to do and most importantly, WHY those activities help.
- Understand the different developmental skills- physical, linguistic, cognitive and personal-social.  
- Track your baby and toddler’s height and weight by month and record all the precious memories
- Personalized daily activity plan esp. tailored for your baby’s needs- as you complete activities and give us your feedback, your child’s plan will be adapted accordingly. 
- Assess your child’s progress through developmental milestones for each month 
- 400+ articles and well researched parenting tips on everything that impacts your baby’s development- breastfeeding, meal plans, foods that boost immunity, recipes. 
- Digital baby book to record all the amazing moments related to your child's growth and learning journey through photos, videos, notes and more. Includes 150+ cute templates from baby's first day at home to first day at school with themes like space, jungle, farm, marine life and more.

- Weekly research based tips and articles to support you on your parenting journey.

Subscription
You can download KinderPass for FREE. 
For Families with kids below 2 years of age, we've made KinderPass absolutely FREE.

For families with kids above 2, you will enjoy a FREE trial of our premium features for the first 90 days. If you choose to become a premium member, you get full access to 1200+ activities and 3 personalised activities a day for upto 5 children. You will also be able to track your child’s progress, create a digital baby book and access past activities and favorites. You can also add unlimited caregivers and children to the same account.

Coming soon- online learning for toddlers and preschoolers, learning products and games for preschoolers, vaccination reminders and more language options!

title: Og Health
description:
Og Health is One Global innovative digital health platform that provides world class services to individuals and corporate organizations targeting pioneer preventive care services to maintain a healthy lifestyle and business environment.


Og Health provides recommendations related to vaccines in different categories (Immunity, Travel, Pregnancy, High risk groups and pets) and send smart reminders when you have an upcoming vaccine according to the international and local vaccination standard.

Corporate companies can measure the Health and Wellness of their employees using the Organizational Wellness Survey. It is an assessment that encompasses many different areas of personal and organizational wellness. The main purpose of the survey is to gather, analyze and present information that may be impacting the wellness of the whole organization and provide areas of focus to help the company enhance their personal workplace experience. 

Users will be able to utilize the platform for themselves, beloved dependents, pets, or other individuals who give permission to do so.

“Og Health is a trademark of One Global Service. Reg. U.S. Pat. & Tm. Off.  Europe”

title: Immunization Summary
description:
The Immunization Summary is an app for visualizing data (tables, graphs, maps) on policies, activities and impact of national immunization systems. These data are reported by WHO & UNICEF Member States annually for incidence, coverage, immunization system indicators and vaccination schedules.

The WHO-UNICEF estimates of national immunization coverage constitute an independent technical assessment of coverage.

Data are available from 1980 to 2019 (as of July 2020) for 195 countries or territories.
Data from 1980 to 2020 will be available in July 2021.

The app is currently available in the six official WHO languages.

The app is currently available in the six official WHO languages.

title: Measles Disease & Treatment
description:
Measles is a highly contagious viral disease. It remains an important cause of death among young children globally, despite the availability of a safe and effective vaccine.

Under the Global Vaccine Action Plan, measles and rubella are targeted for elimination in five WHO Regions by 2020. WHO is the lead technical agency responsible for coordination of immunization and surveillance activities supporting all countries to achieve this goal.

Measles is transmitted via droplets from the nose, mouth or throat of infected persons. Initial symptoms, which usually appear 10–12 days after infection, include high fever, a runny nose, bloodshot eyes, and tiny white spots on the inside of the mouth. Several days later, a rash develops, starting on the face and upper neck and gradually spreading downwards.

Severe measles is more likely among poorly nourished young children, especially those with insufficient vitamin A, or whose immune systems have been weakened by HIV/AIDS or other diseases. The most serious complications include blindness, encephalitis (an infection that causes brain swelling), severe diarrhoea and related dehydration, and severe respiratory infections such as pneumonia.

Routine measles vaccination for children, combined with mass immunization campaigns in countries with low routine coverage, are key public health strategies to reduce global measles deaths.

title: Vaccination Record
description:
The Immunization Record includes:

* Vaccine Registry, Configure the current vaccination scheme in your country.

* Configuration of vaccines alarms to be applied.

* Record of general information of the child, blood group, apgar and allergies.

* Storage of somatometric data of weight, height and the calculation of the body mass index.

* Graphs of percentiles of weight for age, height for age and weight for height, with data from the World Health Organization (WHO).

* Nutritional record of the child according to the recommendations of your health professional.

* Keep track of medical prescriptions that your baby has been prescribed. Attach the image of your prescriptions and have the medication history at hand.

* Register notifications for medicines, food and other types of notification.

* Backup and restore from a backup copy from google drive.

title: Pediatric pedia
description:
Pedia app
 It’s the first professional app specially designed for pediatricians(house officers ,residents ,and professors) in the middle east that provide most of the diagnostic tools and calculations that pediatricians  meet in their daily practice in an easy ,quick and accurate way.
Pedia app is unique by its sophisticated and multiple features which are  not present in any other app ,meeting the requirements of all pediatricians.
This app may be considered as  a must have (E – handbook) for all pediatricians.

Pedia app consist of features :
 1- Growth curves: weight for age, length for age, head circumference for age and weight for length
Based on CDC growth curves
2- Jaundice curves : based on AAP curves 
Doctors can plot the bilirubin level and can detect the proper management of this patient either phototherapy or exchange transfusion 
3- Vital signs: blood pressure, respiratory rate and heart Rate
detect normal range for every age group 
there are special charts for  blood pressure to detect whether child blood pressure  is normal , prehyhypertensive or hypertensive. 
4- ER: 
•	provides dose calculator for resuscitation and emergency drugs and infusions 
•	Also provides size of equipments used un ER  according to the age of the child.

Pedia app is unique by its sophisticated and multiple features which are not present in any other app ,meeting the requirements of all pediatricians.
This app may be considered as a must have (E – handbook) for all pediatricians.

Pedia app consist of features :

3- Vital signs: blood pressure, respiratory rate and heart Rate
detect normal range for every age group

title: myVax
description: Before you vax, get myVax™. MyVax™ is an affordable, single system platform that puts you in control of your vaccinations and vaccine eligibility needs during your vaccine journey. Your vaccine eligibility information such as medical history and lab tests can be put into one place where you need it and when you need it for your next vaccine dose. Get real time access to your vaccine and monitor your vaccine progress by sharing directly with your health care providers and pharmacists. Get immediate alerts related to the vaccines you or your family members have received and report back to the FDA or CDC if you experience any symptoms from your vaccine. Regardless of source or healthcare provider, your vaccine eligibility documents and health information can be kept in one platform, with you empowered to share that information.

title: HPVcancerFree
description:
As a parent, you want to do what's best to protect your children. Unfortunately, there’s a lot of confusing and conflicting information about the HPV vaccine. That’s why we want you to know the facts. HPVCancerFree was created specifically for Texas Children’s Pediatrics (TCP) parents… to learn more about the HPV vaccine and how to get it for your child.

HPVCancerFree is a collaboration between researchers and healthcare providers at Texas Children’s Pediatrics, the University of Texas Health Science Center at Houston (UTHealth) School of Public Health, and Baylor College of Medicine.

HPVCancerFree contains information about:

• HPV infection and diseases caused by HPV
• The HPV vaccine – its purpose, safety, and effectiveness
• HPV vaccination schedule and recommendations 
• Talking to your child’s pediatrician about the HPV vaccine
• How to get the HPV vaccine for your child

Features include:

HPV A-Z:  Learn more about HPV and the HPV vaccine. 

Bust a Myth:  Get the facts on some common myths about HPV and read what TCP pediatricians and parents have to say about these myths.

Notes 4 Doc:  Record questions you have for your child’s pediatrician about the HPV vaccine.

Get the Vax:  Set up an appointment to get your child vaccinated and schedule vaccine appointment reminders.

Funding for this app is provided by the Cancer Prevention and Research Institute of Texas (CPRIT).

This app is part of the Adolescent Vaccination Project and requires an assigned login in order to be used.

title: ProVacina - Standard
description:
Controle seu cartão de vacina de maneira simples e objetiva.

Com o ProVacina é possível controlar o cartão de vacinação pessoal e de seus dependentes, além de não se preocupar mais com calendário de vacinação, pois o aplicativo irá notificá-lo o momento de tomar a vacina.

Principais funcionalidades do aplicativo:
- Controle do cartão de vacinação
- Notificação da data de vacinação
- Informações sobre cada vacina - Guia de Referência
- Controle do crescimento

Lista das principais vacinas do Brasil incluídas:
- BCG-ID
- Hepatite A e Hepatite B
- Pentavalente ( DTP + Hib + HB )
- VIP Vacina Inativada Poliomielite e VOP Vacina Oral Poliomielite
- VORH Vacina Oral de Rotavírus Humano
- Vacina pneumocócica 10
- Vacina Meningocócica C
- Febre Amarela
- SCR Tríplice Viral
- Varicela
- DTP Tríplice Bacteriana
- HPV
- Influenza sazonal
- Pneumocócica 23 - valente

Este App é aderente ao Cartão de Vacina ou Cartão de Imunização Infantil do calendário do Ministério da Saúde.

Atenção: O Calendário de Vacinação é aquele definido pelo PNI - Programa Nacional de Imunizações do Ministério da Saúde e pela SBIN - Associação Brasileira de Imunizações, conforme infomações nos sites http://portal.saude.gov.br/portal/saude/profissional/area.cfm?id_area=1448 e http://www.sbim.org.br/calendarios.htm

Vacinas atualizadas conforme calendário de vacinação de 2012

Obs: Versão completa e livre de propagandas

title: Private Health
description:
Private Health provides you with a comprehensive collection of your health data, ranging from blood pressure readings and intake of medicines to vaccinations. This gives you the opportunity to have a personal health record.

All data is stored exclusively on the device used and at your chosen locations for documents and backups.

Private Health also provides the option to encrypt the entered data in the database and to assign a custom database password. This feature can be enabled in the app settings.

Health journal:
The health journal provides a complete overview of your health data. Here, data such as blood pressure and heart rate, body readings (weight, height, BMI, and BFP), doctor visits, activities, and notes can be collected. In addition, the health journal lists entries for ingestions of medicine and for vaccinations. Various statistical evaluations of your measured values ​​are available.

Medicines:
Here you can manage your medications and prescriptions. All intake times of the current day will be listed. The intake can be confirmed simply by a switch. You can go back and forth in the overview or select a specific date. You can be reminded of the intake by notification, the reminder function can be set individually for each prescription.

Vaccinations:
Appointments for recommended vaccinations are calculated using the date of birth and previous vaccinations. It is based on a list of vaccinations recommended by the Standing Vaccination Commission and the associated vaccination calendar (published in Epidemiological Bulletin No. 34 of the Robert Koch Institute). The list of recommended vaccinations can be expanded. You can change the vaccination data and the vaccination schedule (for example, the number and interval of primary vaccinations and booster vaccinations) or delete vaccinations.

You can back up your data on the device used or in the cloud and reload it from there. It is possible to save or import the data of a single person separately.

Health journal and statistics can be saved as PDF. Before saving the health journal you can select the period and entry type, and whether private entries should be included (for example, entries for taking medicines and vaccinations). In addition, the health journal can be saved as a CSV file.

Trial version limitations:
With the free trial version, up to 10 journal entries and 3 prescriptions can be captured and backup is not available.

title: Kidlr Baby Milestones Tracker
description:
Save and track your kids & baby milestones, medical records, videos, photos and vaccination alerts, all in one app. Kidlr is an all in one platform to organize your kid's digital life in one place. It lets you save photos, videos, medical records, vaccination history, doctor's appointment, milestones and achievements of your kids. Each kid gets a separate timeline. You can not only save your kids memories, but can also share these memories with your friends and family safely and privately.

Stop managing your kids photos, medical records, vaccination alerts, videos, doctor's appointments, important notes and important dates all in several different apps. Kidlr is a solution to keep up with all the changes happening in your kids' lives all in single and convenient timeline. Just record those special moments, achievements and milestones for every kid in your kid's unique timeline and get back to these beautiful memories easily.

Baby Daybook / Photo Book (Videos & Photos):
Create a photo book for each of your kid separately and make sure you save all those smiles, laughter and innocence forever in a convenient and elegant way. Kidlr allows you to save albums of photos and videos safely inside the app in a chronological order. You can save as many albums as you want and also share them with your friends and family privately and safely. With Kidlr you can manage your kid's daybook or photo book with convenience and in style. Kidlr is the best daybook app for your kids and babies. Maintain all the albums in photo books separate for each kid and enjoy a lifetime of memories which are never forgotten with Kidlr. With Kidlr, you will just love the way you fly through the history of your kids growth.

Kids & Baby Milestones:
You want to save every precious moment of your kid, but there's no easy way to do it. Kidlr provides you with an awesome feature to record all those precious and valuable moments conveniently for each kid, separately. Each memory becomes a Card and all the cards are stacked up against each other for your review later. You can attach photos and videos to these cards. Don't let those precious memories fade away in your several messenger apps or old phones. Save your child's developmental milestones in Kidlr and access them from anywhere, anytime. Kidlr syncs your data across all of your devices instantly.

Baby Medical & Health Records:
Kidlr helps in managing health records for all of your kids in a single app. You get to save all the medical reports and health records for your kids in a single timeline, unique to every kid, and get back to the records instantly. Whether it's a regular checkup report, a prescription, doctor's notes for your kids or any other medical or health record. The app provides an easy way to save all your medical health record documents in a convenient way which are critical to your child's health. Moreover, with friends and family feature, you get to share the reports privately with your closest or nearest friends and family. 

Health Alerts & Reminders:
Apart from the health records, Kidlr alerts you whenever a vaccination is due for your kids. Each kid has his own timeline for vaccinations and other medical conditions. Based on the age of your kid and the international standard for kids health, Kidlr will remind you when a vaccination is due for your kid. You can mark if the vaccination is already taken or schedule a reminder right from the health alert message. The app also allows you to read more about the vaccination in case you want to make yourself aware of your child's health requirements.

Kidlr is an all in one app to keep track of your child's milestones, health, daybook, photos, videos, medical records, health records, vaccination and health alerts. We are adding more features to the app regularly. Give Kidlr a try.

Visit us:
http://kidlr.co
https://www.facebook.com/kidlrco

Privacy:
http://kidlr.co/#/privacy-policy

title: WebMD Baby
description:
Over 1.7 million parents have downloaded the WebMD Baby app to track their baby’s development and get trusted, physician-approved advice.  In this single, free app, you’ll have the right resources to raise your newborn.

Five comprehensive tools to keep track of important needs and stay on schedule:
- Breastfeeding, bottle-feeding, and solid-food trackers – record and review all your feeding and nursing sessions, including both breast milk and formula. 
- Sleep tracker:  Records not only time of each session, but location such as crib, car seat, stroller, and more.
- Diaper tracker: Keep track of each diaper change -- dry, wet, or both.
- Growth tracker:  Allows you to record height, weight, and head circumference.
- Baby Book: Capture your baby's memories and share them with collaborators. (Note: videos cannot be shared or backed up due to file sizes)
- The nursing and feeding trackers allow you to schedule reminders and even base them on previous feedings.
- Collaborate with your partner, relatives, or caregiver to keep track of all your child’s needs. Tracker updates sync across all devices.

WebMD is like a pediatrician in your pocket with an extensive library of medically-approved content including 400 articles, 598 tips, and 70 videos:
- Baby  & Toddler Care (16 categories)
- Illness & Emergencies (39 categories)
- Just for Moms
- Just for Dads
- Parenting Tips (367)
- Baby Week by Week (64 content packages)
- Ask the Pediatrician (8 video Q&A sessions with a WedMD in-house pediatrician)
- Milestones (7 categories divided by age up to 24 months old) 
- Vaccines (all baby vaccine info)
- Baby Doctor Visits (11 well visit guides)

"It is arguably more practical and useful than many of the others combined." 
-- NYTimes

WebMD Baby "will significantly lighten up your diaper bag" 
-- Consumer Reports

"New parents can rest easy with this great app" 
-- Appolicious

"I will probably find myself reading one of those featured articles on one my many sleepless nights!" 
-- USA Today

About WebMD
WebMD Health Corp. (Nasdaq: WBMD) is the leading provider of health information services, serving consumers, physicians, healthcare professionals, employers, and health plans through our public and private online portals, mobile platforms and health-focused publications. More than 95 million unique visitors access the WebMD Health Network each month.

The WebMD Health Network includes WebMD Health, Medscape, MedicineNet, emedicineHealth, RxList, theheart.org, drugs.com and Medscape Education.
SOURCE WebMD Health Corp.

If you are a California resident, California law may provide you with certain rights regarding our use of your personal information. For more information relevant to our users who are California residents, please review the "California Residents" section of our Privacy Policy linked on this download page or within our app.

WebMD. Better Information. Better Health.

WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on the WebMD mobile application.

We loved this app for our first child. However, our new baby is 3 weeks old and I have not been able to add my husband as a collaborator, so it's kind of useless until I can. The email that he receives appears to have a link that says "Accept Invite". However, it's not clickable. Is there another way for him to accept my invite to be added as a collaborator?

I like the tracking options but I would not suggest this app to anyone. I am a nanny and have 2 babies to take care of. Half the time the app lags or doesn't save my information I put in. It is SOOOO frustrating and a waste of my time away from the babies to literally re-input 1/4 of what I already typed in. I've been using it for 10 months and I'm switching because it gets me so frustrated.

this app initially worked well, but once we had over 1,000 photos for our first child and we added our second child we started having tons of issues. not worth the frustration. we are moving to a different app because of all the issues. I did like the little weekly and monthly informational bites.

title: PensterDocs – Pet records
description:
PensterDocs is the #1 app to manage your pet’s health! Have more quality time with the pet you love with PensterDocs—the simple and fun app that stores all your pet’s vaccination records in one spot and provides reminders for appointments. No more shuffling through papers, emails, or texts at the vet or the groomers! All important documents are only a click away! 


Being organized is effortless with PensterDocs. Create a profile for your pet and receive reminders about upcoming appointments or vaccinations. Now a trip to the kennel, grooming salon, or pet trainer is easy: access check up summaries, shot verifications, or any other documents without using data or WiFi! 

Features: 
•	Store, access, and share your pet records via email, text, or print. 
•	Access all documents offline. 
•	Set reminders for important appointments and vaccination due dates. 
•	Locate veterinarians, kennels, groomers, dog parks, nearby or anywhere across the globe.  
•	Plan a vacation with your pet and know where all pet services are, and have it handy in case of an emergency when you’re not at your home base.  
•	Quick dial your veterinarian or any related pet service. 
•	Find nearby animal rescue centers. 
•	Share your pet’s profile and notes, including allergies and favorite treats, with dog walkers, pet sitters, and household members. 
•	Explore the community feed filled with adorable pictures; “like” and comment on posts.   

Designed by a pair of pet lovers inspired by their border collie/lab mix, Penelope – aka “Penster” – PensterDocs keeps pets (and pet owners!) happy and healthy.

**Download PensterDocs today!

For more information, visit our website www.pensterdocs.com or follow @pensterdocs on Instagram.

summary: A pet community app for organizing and sharing your pet’s vital info.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and optimizations.
comments: Good app, needs work. The app does NOT allow letters in the microchip field, which is dumb since some microchip companies have letters in their chip IDs. Also, there is no option to store the information on the phone's SD card. It would be nice if you could attach several photos to your pet's profile. And it would be nice to have a separate shot record for each pet, so an owner could look up the date of the last Rabies vaccine shot.
This is a great app, unfortunately it keeps crashing on Android to the point where it can't be opened. Hopefully this problem gets fixed asap.
Love the app.  Would love to be able to add vet address in Canada.  Doesn't allow for Canadian postal code.  Hope to see that change, it would make it a 5* app 😁

This app is great, I particularly love that you can take photos of your vet records, certificates, etc. The ability to add reminders for vaccinations etc directly to your calendar app of choice is awesome. For dogs, cats, and birds, this is a great app. Aside from my cat though, all my pets are geckos, and the app has no options for reptiles... being able to track ALL my pets in here would make this a seriously great app.
Crash fixed thanks👍

title: VacinAção!
description:
O que você acha de entrar no corpo humano e ajudar a defendê-lo de vírus e bactérias? E se isso envolver um jogo de ação e estratégia com muitos tiros e explosões?

No VacinAção! você ajuda o exército do corpo humano – os glóbulos brancos – a destruírem todo e qualquer invasor que queira fazer mal a nós!

Para isso eles contam com o auxílio das vacinas, armas poderosas na defesa do corpo! Tudo isso em um jogo completamente grátis!

- Ajude na defesa do corpo humano em um shooter alucinante cheio de ação!
- São 30 fases de ação e mais de 10 tipos de inimigos!
- Derrote os 5 chefes espalhados pelas fases!
- Monte sua estratégia para chegar mais rápido à vitória!
- Jogo grátis, sem transações in-game e nem propagandas!

Premiado no INOVAPPS (http://www.comunicacoes.gov.br/concurso-inovapps), um concurso voltado para o fomento de inovação tecnológica promovido pelo Ministério das Comunicações, o VacinAção! está disponível para iOS, Android, Windows Phone e Blackberry.

Equipe de desenvolvimento:

Lucas Berto de Oliveira
Giulia Adriene Lins Cavalcanti
Rodrigo Carneiro de Menezes
Miguel John Doherty

title: WHO Academy by the World Health Organization
description:
This is the official World Health Organization mobile learning app for health workers seeking COVID-19 information. Brought to you by the WHO Academy, it focuses on providing them with critical, evidence-based information and tools to improve their skills and capabilities related to the pandemic.   

Health workers need accurate, extensive, reliable, and timely information on COVID-19 to save lives and stay safe.  

This app delivers an efficient way to access WHO’s COVID-19 knowledge resources all in one place.  It offers up-to-the-minute guidance, training, and virtual workshops to support health workers in caring for patients infected by COVID-19 – as well as how they can protect themselves as they do their critical work.

With content in six languages – Arabic Chinese, English, French, Russian and Spanish – the app is a convenient tool for accessing WHO’s rapidly expanding and evolving training materials and guidance, along with opportunities to participate in virtual classrooms and other live training.

Key features include learning guidance, learning materials, and tools organized into the following COVID-19 subject matter areas:
•	Case Management:  How to care for COVID-19 patients
•	Infection Prevention Control / Staff Safety and Health:  Protecting health worker and the community
•	Epidemiology:  Distribution, characteristics, and determinants of COVID-19
•	Laboratory:  Laboratory testing for COVID-19 in humans
•	Maintaining Essential Health Services and Systems:  Strategic planning and coordinated action
•	International Health Regulations:  Public health and international spread of disease
•	Risk Communication and Community Engagement:  Communicating effectively with the public
•	Research & Development:  Working towards a treatment and a vaccine.
•	Operational Support and Logistics
•	Regional Information 

It also includes updated news and statistics on the COVID-19 pandemic.
This app is brought to you by the WHO Academy, a new internal division of WHO.  The Academy will be officially launched in May 2021 as the WHO’s state-of-the-art lifelong learning center, applying the latest technologies and adult learning science to meet the learning needs of millions of health workers, policymakers, and WHO staff around the world.  

More about the WHO Academy: http://academy.who.int

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: Relatively good information provided. However, two issues I came across with regards to accessibility: no dates provided in the app itself (with only some articles, posters, etc.), and these were not even placed in chronological order (making it difficult to get the most up-to-date information [unless it was ordered as being most popular? but even still])!, a couple links did not produce an article or any information either.
Fantastic. Very quick and appropriate context for Service providers, policy makers and politicians. It will strengthen the current orientation sessions being undertaken by Ministry of Health
Very good app. Easy to use and very helpful. Thank you very much for your hard work guys. We realy appreciate it
Very fast. Lots of info. Easy to access. Great App.
Excellent pocket dictionary on health

title: Pill Reminder App : Track Medication, Water & Diet
description:
This  Pill Reminder App makes it easy for individuals to follow their medication plans as well as track daily water intake and diet plan. 

✓ Enhances medication compliance for patients with a crazy-busy life. The simple user interface makes it a great tool even for those not so familiar with modern technology.

✓ This app is perfect for patients of all ages. Particularly for seniors to eliminate missing a dose.

✓ It enables you to schedule various medications with multiple doses at different times of day.

✓ It Offers simple, modern and clean user interface.

✓ Website access available at https://web.pillreminderapp.com

✓ It securely stores your medication history and you can generate weekly, monthly, or yearly reports to help your specialist with the progress.


The app comprises 5 major sections: 


💢 Medication Reminder
💢 New Measurements
💢 Doctor Visit
💢 Vaccine Reminders
💢 Water intake & Diet Tracker

Here’s what each section does:

MEDICATION REMINDER


This is where you manage all of your medications. Here you set reminders for each medication to avoid missing doses. Notifications remind you to follow your medication regimen.

To set reminders, you will first need to indicate whether you are taking pills, syrups, or injections. You can set reminders on them collectively or separately, depending on how you use them. Daily reminders, weekly reminders, monthly reminders, and yearly reminders are all available.

Another great feature of this section is Inventory Setting. Here you can enter the number of medications left in your medical box and tell it to send an alert when you are left with a certain number. The app will notify that ‘You are running out of medication’ as soon as you reach that amount.


 
NEW MEASUREMENTS


This section lets you store various health measurements such as

✓ blood pressure readings, 
✓ heartbeat rate, 
✓ sugar level, etc.

It contains standard measurements for each health problem and matches them with the readings you take to see if you are doing well. For example, the normal blood pressure reading is 120/80. Also, this section creates a timeline of each reading on a daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly basis. Using this timeline, your physician can easily monitor your results.


DOCTOR VISITS


This is a great feature that helps you to set reminders in order to keep track of upcoming doctor appointments.

First thing you will need to do is to add the doctor to the Pill Tracker App. Next, you will enter the date and time at which the visit will occur.

💢 An awesome thing about this section is that it lets you record the audio of the entire conversation between you and doctor by their consent. 

Doctors often give you a lot of information quickly. This will help you keep record of the doctor’s advice and replay as necessary to confirm your understanding. Also, the Important Note feature in this section helps you take written notes of everything that the doctor says. 

VACCINE REMINDERS

Timely vaccinations are important to ensure healthy growth of your child. To make things easier, use the

Vaccine Reminder feature 

of our app. Here you will find numerous vaccination schedule templates.

The section has two features:

✓Active Vaccines
✓Schedule Vaccines

In Active Vaccines, there is a list of vaccines that you can select from to indicate the ones your child has already received. It has built-in templates for vaccinations like measles, polio, severe hack we call it whooping cough, and others. Here you can set reminders to ensure your child receives timely immunizations. 

Diet & Water Intake Reminder:

As a part of 1.1.5+ version, you can also track your daily water intake, track your breakfast, track your lunch & dinner and any custom diet plan. 

Getting timely water reminders helps you keep hydrated throughout the day.

developerAddress:
107 Ist Floor Sajjad Center Main Expo Center Road

recentChanges:
Vaccine reminder more units added and following:

New Version 1.1.5. Following are the new features:

- Track Water Intake and get a reminder for configured water in take
- Track and get reminder for your diet. You can now track your breakfast, lunch, dinner and custom so many other meal types i.e Diet for your Gym or any special diet routine.
comments: could you add the option to simply select name, every x hours, for x days. and starting time for first intake. so that I don't have to count or calculate***absolutely anything***. This app already has one function but it reminds for every x days. I want to be reminded every x hours during x days. Also I have to calculate the days on the calendar till the exact day for the med will last, while you could simply ask for the number of days.

This app would be ok if you are only taking one medication at each notification. I take 6 different meds at 8:30. It's a pain to mark one, then have to scroll back down the list the mark the next one. And it's very hard to change the time for a med. As soon as I find another one, I will delete this app.

It could be great. But the reminder only goes off one time. If you don't hear it, it will not remind you again. would be nice if it would alert every few minutes until you respond, at least a few times.

I'm impressed by the sophistication of the app, and how great the level of detail is when creating medications and setting up reminders. Unfortunately this isn't matched by its usability: navigating the different sections is quite clunky. The most frustrating aspect of this app is confirming medications were correctly admnistered, using the controls inside the notifications pop-ups. These are a great idea, however they don't work as expected, which in my case resulted in inaccurate stats.

It's a really good app. However I'm taking away 1 star for some annoying features. When you get the pop-up you can click you've taken it or to snooze it (cool feature) but then it takes you to the app (WHY?!), instead of going away like a normal notification. And then, whenever you wanna exit the app, it asks you for confirmation. Both things are annoying and unnecessary!

title: ReadyVax
description:
There is a lot of information available about vaccines and vaccination, and there are many mobile apps related to vaccines. However, there are few apps designed by trusted academic experts that can be rapidly updated for both routine use and emergency situations, such as outbreaks.

ReadyVax is a new app that contains up-to-date information about vaccines and vaccination. With regularly updated data on vaccine recommendations and vaccine safety, and the ability to notify users in real-time of important vaccine information, ReadyVax is your trusted source for evidence-based information about vaccines. We have designed ReadyVax to be used by both health care providers and health care users, and users can customize the presentation of data, with a single click, to suit their information needs.
Every time you start the app, the latest information is downloaded into your copy. This information will be accessible even if you lose network connectivity. The ReadyVax team constantly monitors vaccine recommendations to make sure the most up-to-date information is there for you.

Key features of ReadyVax:
-For every vaccine, we have documented who should get the vaccine, the recommended schedule and the safety profile.
-Descriptions of the diseases prevented by these vaccines.
-A personalized immunization scheduler to keep track of recommended vaccines (based on CDC recommendations)
-Answers to frequently asked questions about vaccines and vaccine safety.
-Real-time breaking news alerts and updates about vaccines and vaccine-preventable diseases.
-Links to resources about vaccines, vaccine safety, and vaccine recommendations from trusted sources.
-One-click customization of information for health care users or health care providers.
-A causality of adverse event algorithm to support providers' decision maker

good app, it has solid information about vaccines

title: Yepipet
description:
YepiPet is a comprehensive pet care app. it is designed with many intelligent and intuitive features for busy pet owners, like you, to up keep with your pet’s health and well-being. 

Vaccination Record Management. 
YepiPet helps pet owners to quick to create and manage a vaccination record. It will also automatically notify you on any upcoming vaccination. 

Care Schedule and Reminder.
 Every pet requires different care.
 YepiPet recommends different schedules that are best suited for the specific breed of your pet. This helps you to easily create a comprehensive care schedule. YepiPet then automatically sends a reminder to you when a care event is due.

Weight Record Management. 
Weight is the most important growth indicator for any pet. YepiPet allows you to record your pet’s weight and display an intuitive growth trend.

Weight & Body Shape Monitoring. 
YepiPet also facilitates body examination and provides feedback on whether your pet’s weight and body shape is ideal or otherwise.

title: Календарь прививок PRO
description:
Приложение помогает родителям вести учет сделанных прививок, а также не забыть о предстоящих.

Просто укажите дату рождения Вашего ребенка и приложение само составит календарь вакцинации. Не забывайте отмечать уже сделанные прививки - если прививка была перенесена по какой-либо причине, приложения само рассчитает индивидуальный график.

В основе - приказ министерства здравоохранения Российской Федерации от 21.03.2014 № 125н
"Об утверждении национального календаря профилактических прививок и календаря профилактических прививок по эпидемическим показаниям".

Также есть возможность вести учет не включенных в список обязательных прививок, например, против гриппа или клещевого энцефалита.

Полная версия.

title: Календарь прививок
descriptionHTML:
Приложение для современных родителей!

Следите за прививками своего ребенка!

Наше приложение поможет вам точно узнать все сроки вакцинации. Вам необходимо только указать дату рождения ребенка, что позволит уточнить его возраст и рассчитать даты назначения прививок. Такой календарь не может учесть медицинские противопоказания, поэтому ваш реальный календарь вакцинации может отличаться от расчетного. Около каждой прививки будет указан оптимальный для вакцинации возраст.

Основные возможности:

- расчет сроков прививок в зависимости от возраста ребенка;
- возможность указать назначенную дату вакцинации;
- возможность сохранить информацию о наименовании вакцины;
- возможность сохранить информацию о прививочной реакции;
- полезные сведения о различных прививках;
- наглядный индивидуальный календарь вакцинации.

Помните о том, что любая прививка проводится только после консультации с педиатром!
summary: The app will help you to know exactly all the terms of the child's vaccination.
recentChanges:
- Добавлена возможность фильтровать прививки по типу.
- Теперь можно указать входит ли ребенок в группу риска, чтобы скрыть/показать прививки предназначенные только детям из группы риска.
comments: Отличное приложение! Большое спасибо! Только исправьте, пожалуйста, ошибку в названии диаСКИНтеста (от английского skin - кожа) Upd:спасибо большое ☺️
Все прививки с детальным описанием, отдельный учет по всем детям.

title: PetPro Connect
description:
The PetProConnect™ app enables pet owners to connect like never before with their vet through their smartphone.  Your pet's past, present, and future is right here.

 

With the PetPro Connect™ app, you can:

 

• Connect with your vet. Conveniently connect with your vet clinic with PetPro Connect™ messenger to ask questions or share pictures with your vet. Or, schedule a "face-to-face" consult with your vet on your smartphone using the video tool that allows your vet to evaluate your pet visually from a remote location.

• Instant access to your pet’s medical history.  Need to share your pet’s latest vaccination records? Share your pet's complete medical records including vaccinations right from your phone!

• Appointment reminders and scheduling.  Need to know about upcoming checkups?  Receive automatic reminders of upcoming vaccinations and check-ups and easily schedule an appointment without calling.

• Connect with quicker rebate redemption.  Eliminate the paperwork. Submit rebates right from your smartphone with PetPro Connect™.  Easily submit rebates on the app for select pet care products and then receive notifications the moment your rebate has been validated.

title: Vaccinate Vanuatu
description:
Vaccinate Vanuatu provides immunization information for parents with recently born children (less than 1 year). It will send reminders to your phone when it is time for your child to be vaccinated, and provide you with information about the vaccines they should be receiving; why they are important and what diseases they are preventing.
This app is available in French, English, and Bislama.

title: Your Doctors - 24/7 Online Doctors Chat
description:
Your Doctors Online is your 24-hour connection to a doctor. No more waiting rooms and no more scheduling - get a real-time connection to our team of 150+ board certified doctors for a convenient online chat with a doctor. Join our over 150,000 members today. 

We offer more than just a real time 24 hour connection to a doctor. We also offer a wide range of tools to make managing your family’s health much easier. 

Your Health Care Tool Box:

24/7 Online Doctor Chat - Health care concerns don’t always happen during business hours. Accessing your doctor can be expensive, inconvenient and often requires a long wait for an appointment (and in the waiting room!) Our real time connection to a doctor means that your questions are answered when you need it, from the convenience of home. 

Medication Reminders - Never miss a dose with our built-in medication reminders. Our app makes managing your prescriptions, vitamins and even birth control easy. 

Store Health Insurance Cards - Trips to the doctor or emergency room can be stressful and difficult. Knowing that you always have your health insurance card at your fingertips can make that process easier to manage. 

Vaccination Records and Reminders-  Starting a family means many trips to the doctor. Our vaccination record tool explains the timing of your child’s vaccination as well as the medications that will be administered. Our tool can even set a reminder in your calendar! 

Add Family Members - Our family plan allows you to add members of your immediate family to your profile. Right now we are offering this upgrade absolutely free! With the family plan you’re able to truly give your family members the gift of health while still paying less than a dollar a day. It truly is an affordable way to take care of your whole family’s health care. 



24 Hour Day Pass

Our day pass gives users 24 hour access to our physicians. This is a great option for those who want to use the many features within the Your Doctors Online app but only connect with a doctor periodically. This is a great value at $29.99. Your Doctors Online offers the convenience of telehealth for about the cost of a copay at the doctor’s office. All while skipping the waiting room and connecting at your convenience. Our day pass allows you the flexibility to connect with a doctor whenever you need to at the touch of a button. 

Monthly All-Access Pass

Our monthly access pass gives users the convenience of a follow up visit (or two) for the same low price as a day pass. That’s right, you don’t need to worry if your condition changes or you need more information. Our monthly pass allows unlimited access for 30 days. This pass is perfect for those following new medical conditions closely, who are pregnant or trying to conceive or have young children. There is no need to worry about the germs of a busy waiting room, booking time off work or traveling to connect with a doctor. With our monthly plan you are putting a doctor in your pocket for less than a dollar a day. 

Your First Three Days are FREE

We also offer a FREE trial where first-time users can try our service for free for the first three days. We are so confident in our services that we want to give new users the chance to connect with our doctors risk free for three days.

title: Vacunas
description:
Vacunas is an application of the Public Health System of Andalusia (SSPA) that allows you to access the set of vaccines that you and your beneficiaries have received. In addition, you can review the current Andalusian Vaccination Plan and general immunization information.

The use of this application does not replace the doctor-patient relationship.

To be able to access the set of vaccines, an authentication is required. The Andalusian Public Health Service (SSPA) offers different authentication alternatives:

•	Digital Certificate
•	Cl@ve

For any questions about the operation of the application you can contact the mHealth area of ​​the Public Health System of Andalusia, at the e-mail: msspa.sc.sspa@juntadeandalucia.es

title: Immunization Schedue
description:
Immunization Schedule App

This app is mainly designed to help first mothers in keeping and tracking their new borne on immunization schedule. This schedule is done from birth to the age of 10 years

Account Creation Section:

You will use your phone number in which you will be required to enter a sent verification code. Child date of birth will also be required at this step, for helping in immunization followup

Weight Section:

This section is used in keeping child's weight record progress, which is shown in form of a graph.

Immunized Vaccines:

This section is used in keeping records of all immunized vaccines.

User Data:
Phone Number: Will be used for authentication.
Username: Will be used for personal identification and account identification.
Email: Will be used in authentication process during signing in.

Permissions Used:

This app will use your phone to access INTERNET and NETWORK STATE of your phone location also it uses permission to read your internal storage which is mostly used when user picks an image for uploading

title: GCE Urban Immunization
description:
GCE Urban Immunization project aims to increase access of the most vulnerable urban communities living in squatter or unstructured slums by using digital immunization registry for enrolment and tracking in Bangladesh. The project helps to receive recommended immunization services at EPI and unconventional gathering spaces to reach the maximum number of children and women at days and times which are convenient for most families.

The project integrates EPI services into routine primary health care (PHC) operations of the City corporations and NGOs and will thus improve immunization coverage in underserved urban extreme poor populations.

NOTE: This application can only be used by data collectors/health workers part of the program who have the user accounts. If you are interested in knowing more about the program or are interested in a similar application for you, please contact us on this account: info@ihsinformatics.com

title: MyVaxIndiana
description:
The Indiana State Department of Health (ISDH) maintains an Immunization Information 
System known as CHIRP (Children and Hoosier’s Immunization Registry Program). The 
purpose of CHIRP is to collect, forecast, manage, and share vaccine data to registered medical
providers in Indiana. A provider may include private medical facilities, local health 
departments, hospitals, schools, and pharmacies. The program is run under the Indiana Code 
16-38-5 which allows for providers and their designees to access data from CHIRP. In 
addition an individual also may access their personal or their dependents vaccine record 
from either the registered CHIRP provider or directly from the Indiana State Department of 
Health. 

As an update to the existing process, ISDH has created the MyVaxIndiana Immunization 
Portal which enables a person to access a vaccine record from any computer. To begin this 
process a registered CHIRP provider will create a patient ID number (PIN) which will grant a 
person specific patient access to the record they have requested. A parent or guardian could 
request a PIN to view their dependents immunization history, or any individual could do the 
same for their own record. They then have a number of options as to how their data can be 
viewed and saved. This includes an option to print and save the Official Immunization 
Record, download the record into a file format that may be compatible with their Personal 
Health Record system (PHR), or have it faxed or mailed to them.

title: ImMUnity
description:
This is a mobile health application dedicated for the Filipino lay-people that allows users to track their vaccination records and provides educational information about vaccines and immunization.

Users can create multiple profiles within the application so that they can keep track of immunization records of their family members. Users are asked to input basic information (e.g. age, sex) as well as relevant health information (e.g. previous immunization records) in order to create a profile. Based on the information stored in each profile, the application will generate individualized vaccine recommendations and vaccination schedule.

Information on the general principle of vaccination, individual vaccines, as well as FAQs and vaccine myths based on WHO and DOH references can be accessed in this app.

title: MotherToBaby
description:
“What’s safe during pregnancy or while breastfeeding?” “Will my medicine affect the baby? “What’s the latest research about vaccines during pregnancy?” There’s not always time for your doctor to call you back right away, and a search on the internet about the safety of medications and other exposures during pregnancy and breastfeeding may not give you reliable information from a trusted source – that’s where MotherToBaby experts step-in. If you’re planning a pregnancy, currently pregnant, breastfeeding, or are a health care provider, MotherToBaby has the app you’ve been waiting for. A suggested resource by many agencies including the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and the Food and Drug Administration’s (FDA) Office of Women’s Health, the MotherToBaby app has: 

• The capability to connect you with a birth defects research specialist through live chat, text message, e-mail and phone

• A collection of Fact Sheets on hundreds of exposures, such as medications, vaccines, diseases, chemicals, substances of abuse and more with evidence-based answers about their known safety during pregnancy and breastfeeding

• An engaging and informative “Baby Blog” written by experts on hot topics important to women and health care providers

• A way to easily volunteer for studies that contribute important information for future moms and babies

YOU have questions. WE have answers. Run by the world’s leading professional non-profit society of birth defects researchers, MotherToBaby is a reliable, free source for evidence-based answers about medications, vaccines, chemicals, herbals, substances of abuse, beauty products and more during pregnancy and breastfeeding. Available in English and in Spanish, you can chat live, text, e-mail or talk on the phone with a MotherToBaby expert. You can also browse bilingual fact sheets for the latest known research surrounding a variety of exposure topics.

MotherToBaby is a service of the international non-profit Organization of Teratology Information Specialists (OTIS). The Health Resources and Services Administration’s Maternal and Child Health Bureau (HRSA) recently recognized our work by awarding us with a federal funding opportunity to expand our services.

We are always working to bring you new features and answer your questions about exposures during pregnancy and breastfeeding. Send us your suggestions at contactus@mothertobaby.org.

comments: Lots of good info, easy to search for specific medications

The chat option is extremely convenient when it's actually available. The "contact us" link connects to a blank screen. But I do like the scrollable list of medications (I wish it was searchable though, from the main menu) and the option to text. All in all, this app has a lot of potential once they get all the bugs worked out. I look forward to using it as it improves.
It's so nice to actually have reliable info like this. App is easy to use/navigate.

title: MyVac
description:
MyVac - Your vaccine assistant

MyVac assists you to track your vaccine schedules, search for vaccines and doctors, and allows you to book appointments, and navigate to the vaccination centers.

TRACE.BOOK.VACCINATE.
 
Booking an appointment for your next vaccination is effortless. Create your profile, select your vaccine, mark location, find your doctor and book appointment. You can check the consultation fee, educational and experiential background of your doctor. 

The application allows you to:

1. Know your Doctor
The application enables a user to scroll through a doctor's profile before booking an appointment.  

2. Know your vaccine
Want to know about benefits about your vaccine? You get it all here! 

3. Maintain vaccine schedules
Our smart management system utilizes logic to develop vaccine schedule for each profile individually, based on Universally accepted health standard

4. Book vaccines 
The application enables you to select a doctor administering a chosen vaccine, permits a user to book the appointment. 

5. Vaccine Reminders
Many vaccines have a structured rosters. The logics embedded within the application helps the user receive reminders on weekly, daily basis. The application alarms the user before a vaccine is booked, a few days and hours before the date and time booked to take the vaccine.  

6. Vaccine reports
The application permits you to download your vaccine records as on discretion. 

The appointment facility with doctors and vaccination centers is available only in Delhi-NCR.
